original:
<color_yellow>Are you daring enough to explore the BL9 mystery?Explore the custom lore about secret Cataclysm organizations, their dark plans and their attempts to use a new dangerous and unpredictable Blob-like organism type to seize power in this crazy world! </color>

 <color_light_cyan> Huge exotic locations - The Tainted Medieval Castle, The Secret Organization's Militarized Island, huge lush and dangerous underground biomes (over 150+ custom overmaps!)</color>,<color_red> vile and horribly mutated dangerous monsters, new weapons (ballistics too!) and armor </color>
 <color_light_blue> Adds locations and monsters inspired by iconic Resident Evil series made by Capcom</color>
translation:
<color_yellow>你有足够的勇气去探索BL9的谜团吗？探索关于神秘大灾变组织的风俗与传说，他们的黑暗计划以及他们妄想利用一种新的危险和不可预测的变形怪类生物体以试图在这个疯狂的世界中夺取权力的可怕尝试!</color> 

 <color_light_cyan>庞大的诡异地点-被污染的中世纪城堡，秘密组织的军事化岛屿，巨大且繁盛的危险地下生物群（超过150+大地图地点！）</color>，<color_red>丑陋可怕的危险变异怪物，新武器（也包括火炮！）和装甲</color>
<color_light_blue>增加了由卡普空制作的3A大作《生化危机》系列所启发的地点和怪物。</color>

original: Ah, so you've come across the Caustic Plant Caves?BL9 experiments as you can see led to creations of such grotesque but nevertheless beautiful creatures like `IT`, but infusing humans and animals only with this peculiar organism is a true shame for someone who has been experimenting with plants as well - THIS is how Caustic Plant Caves were created - a truly dangerous environment where plant-like BL9 beings live on their own using the best of their 'hive mind' to breed and evolve...
translation: 啊，那你见过腐蚀性植物洞穴？正如你所看到的，BL9实验导致了这种怪诞但美丽的生物的诞生，但是仅仅给人类和动物注入这种特殊的有机体，对于那些一直在尝试植物的人来说是一种真正的耻辱——这就是腐蚀性植物洞穴的形成——一个真正危险的环境，就像植物一样BL9生物依靠自己的生活，利用他们最好的“主巢心智”来繁殖和进化…

original: Crafting is an important part of BL9 - you are able to craft many unique ammo types and very handy melee weapons (and even a secret tier of ranged and melee weapons, but that's a long way for you to go) - the recipes for each you will acquire AUTOMATICALLY upon reaching a certain level in fabrication and mechanics (starting from level 5 of fabrication and mechanics) - each weapon requires generic and rare materials which you'll come across as you play the mod
translation: 制造是BL9的一个重要部分-你可以制造许多独特的弹药类型和非常方便的近战武器（甚至是远程和近战武器的秘密层，但这对你来说还有很长的路要走-每种武器的配方在达到一定的制造和机械水平后会自动获得（从制造和机械的第5级开始）-每种武器都需要通用和稀有的材料，你在玩mod时会遇到这些材料

original: ENOUGH, STOP IT!How about you just STOP and GIVE UP YOURSELF until you are brutally maimed at the hands of my servants?I've warned you before, little moth, but now I am being SERIOUS, you won't get out of this dungeon alive, entire horde of my heavily armed servants awaits you there, trust me - they WILL fight as fiercely, as ferociously as they can to pluck and devour your teeny weeny wings, little moth!
translation: 够了，住手！不如你停下来，放弃自己，直到你被我的仆人残忍地残废？我以前警告过你，小飞蛾，但现在我是认真的，你不会活着离开这个地牢的，我的全副武装的仆人在那里等着你，相信我-他们会尽可能的激烈地战斗，尽他们所能的抓住并吃掉你那小小的翅膀，小飞蛾！

original: Experimenting on BL9 proved to be a daunting yet very lucrative task, we've learned a lot about it's origin, how it lives outside of a host and most importantly - how exactly humans, animals and plants infuse with it, how it `communicates`, compared it to the Blob and Mycus even and my, my...these are mere toys that are only capable of 7% of what BL9 can do and what it WILL do...
translation: 在BL9上进行实验被证明是一项艰巨而又利润丰厚的任务，我们已经了解了很多关于它的起源，它是如何在宿主之外生存的，最重要的是人类、动物和植物是如何与它融合的，它是如何“交流”的，甚至与斑点和Mycus甚至我，我的……这些仅仅是玩具，只能够提供7%的能力BL9能做什么，它能做什么…

original: First of all, to help you with your endeavors, there is a strange trading merchant or a collector of some sorts here around The Castle, the zealots are not hostile towards him for some reason, he claims to be selling `BL9-infused weapons and armor` in exchange for the gold coins from the zealots, I am not sure, but the quality of these seemed good to me upon first glance, but my job here is being a spy and not really going all-guns blazing unless I'm spotted...
translation: 首先，为了帮助你的努力，城堡周围有一个奇怪的商人或收藏家，狂热者并没有出于某种原因对他怀有敌意，他声称正在出售“BL9注入武器和盔甲”来换取狂热者的金币，我不确定，但这些东西的质量似乎很好乍一看，我在这里的工作是做间谍，除非被发现，否则我不会把所有的枪都烧起来…

original: How these organizations establish power?That is a different question - brute force and acts of marauding, threats and semi-propaganda along with promises of survival and resources needed for basic human survival, some of which end up true, and some of which act treacherously killing the survivors considering them merely a chaff, a tainted imperfection that must be eradicated for the new generation of genetically clean, a new elite of some sorts.\n \n    But some of these organizations due to the sheer astounding amount of resources including scientific, medical and engineering have a horribly distorted view of our world - that The Blob, the Nether creatures and whatever else dwells in some God-forsaken places can grant great opportunities to whoever makes a research on them to acquire their powers or somehow learn to control these beings for establishing their rule in different regions of our world - a true daredevil's and a madman's idea...

original: I guess that I really did underestimate you - why would I even think that my grotesque experimental amalgamations will be enough to finally stop you?You need someone like you - my main general will take care of you with great pleasure...
translation: 我想我真的低估了你——为什么我会认为我那怪异的实验性合并会最终阻止你呢？你需要像你这样的人-我的将军会很乐意照顾你…

original: I have ascended into HIS realm, I could feel his might and power - not just his blessing but a magical empowerment, a truly blissful feeling!I quenched my thirst for power, little moth, but now I am HUNGRY!Hungry for blood, your blood especially - I expect you in the tower to send you to Nevulion's realm so he can TORMENT your vile soul endlessly!
translation: 我已经升入了他的领域，我可以感受到他的强大和力量--不仅仅是他的祝福，而是一种神奇的内在力量，一种真正幸福的感觉！我满足了对力量的渴求，小飞蛾，但现在我感到了饥饿！我渴求鲜血，特别是你的血--我希望你也到塔里来，来踏入Nevulion的领域，这样他就可以无休止地折磨你卑劣的灵魂了！

original: I have some bad news - the location of the Castlelan is unknown to us, but we are 100% sure he escaped via the underground passage in the throne room, you MUST chase him down, you'll find the key to the bridge gates on the OTHER side of the bridge in a series of rooms...be careful!
translation: 我有个坏消息-卡斯特兰号的位置我们不知道，但我们百分之百肯定他是通过王座室的地下通道逃走的，你必须把他追下去，你会在一系列房间里找到桥门的钥匙……小心！

original: I hope you're going strong, in order to go further you have to explore the tricky branching Garden Labyrinth, somewhere there you'll find a key that leads to the next room, note that there are 2 keys - you'll need both of them - one you'll find for the construction in the garden that contains the key for advancing further...
translation: 我希望你能走得更远，为了走得更远，你必须探索复杂的分支花园迷宫，在那里你会找到一把通向下一个房间的钥匙，注意这里有两个钥匙-你需要两个钥匙-一个你会在花园里找到一个，里面有进一步前进的钥匙…

original: I must say I am impressed by your skills and wits and what has been saving you from your imminent end, the suspended cargo containers - ah the scent of metal, weapons for my loyal soldiers and `IT` - ah, truly fascinating still!`IT` should keep you busy...`IT` WILL keep you busy!
translation: 我必须说，你的技能和智慧给我留下了深刻的印象，是什么把你从即将到来的结局中拯救出来的，悬浮的货柜——啊，金属的气味，我忠诚的士兵的武器，啊，真的很迷人！`它会让你忙的…`它会让你忙的！

original: I'm starting to wonder what it takes for you to end just like any little moth - burning and turning into dust entirely upon flying to the nearest torch...the next room is my personal Furnace where I smelt ores found in the mines AND the ruins, lest someone should steal my ores I've got two good barbaric bouncers...they WILL treat you accordingly, little moth...
translation: 我开始想知道你怎么才能像任何一只小飞蛾一样结束——飞到最近的火把时完全变成了尘土……隔壁房间是我的个人熔炉，在那里我可以闻到在矿井和废墟中发现的矿石，以免有人偷走我的矿石我有两个很好的野蛮保镖……他们会相应地对待你的，小飞蛾…

original: I've figured it out!The lava caves below which power up the reactor of the military base play the role of a secret exit out of the military base!Before descending into the unknown though, you must DESTROY the military base ENTIRELY - find the keycards that open the room with the central reactor control laptops and destroy the central laptop then get the heck out of there through the lava caves AS FAST AS POSSIBLE!
translation: 我知道了！下面的熔岩洞穴为军事基地的反应堆提供动力，扮演着军事基地秘密出口的角色！在进入未知之前，你必须完全摧毁军事基地-找到钥匙卡打开房间与中央反应堆控制笔记本电脑和摧毁中央笔记本电脑，然后尽快离开那里的熔岩洞！

original: If you cannot reload BL9 guns with the BL9 mags - just drop both weapon AND the mag on the ground and either reload them on the ground OR drop 'em, pick 'em up and try reloading them again, this will solve such TRIVIAL issue of yours, stranger!
translation: 如果你不能用BL9弹夹重新装填BL9枪-只要把武器和弹夹都扔在地上，要么把它们装在地上，要么把它们扔到地上，捡起来再装，这样就能解决你的小问题了，陌生人！

original: In order to balance the strong and heavy damage dealing nature of the monsters, I've created 3 tiers of herbs that will heal you instantly upon use and relieve a significant amount of pain without giving you the painkiller debuff - from mild to the strongest healing herb - BEWARE THOUGH - USE THEM SPARINGLY IN COMBAT - they give you a STACKING DEBUFF for a few minutes to keep everything balanced...
translation: 为了平衡怪物的强伤害和重伤害，我已经创造了三层药草，将立即治愈你的使用和减轻大量的疼痛，而不给你止痛药减益-从温和到最强的治疗药草-尽管小心-在战斗中谨慎使用他们-他们给你一个堆叠的减益几分钟，以保持一切平衡…

translation: 为了到达岛的核心，你必须穿过水洞，据我所知，这里有一个混合了“他们的”士兵和一些生物武器，小心点！

translation: 不幸的是，为了到达岛的另一边，唯一的办法就是通过下面的废物处理室——虽然门是锁着的，但你必须在这附近找到身份证才能打开它，再往前走，我肯定它就在这附近…

original: It will not be a surprise to you if I tell you that the remnants of our organization are not the only ones out there, there is a countless amount of them...huge factions, agencies, societies - members and agents of which were from all kinds of countries possessing all types of valuable assets and resources - including not only material ones but bright minds - professional scientists, engineers, doctors - everyone who could massively contribute and did not require to work openly in big groups with many ordinary people from the mundane society and government sectors.\n \n    The problem is, the Cataclysm created chaos for everyone but at the same time opportunities to be seized for someone who is daring, supplied and strong enough in terms of equipment and resources, we try to fight back, do our best to find out how to slow down at least the growth and spread of The Blob and maybe a way to seal the Nether portals, but some people only crave the power, no matter how matter how primitive and naive this might sound...

original:
Now that you are very well-informed, I believe that you will agree that we must do our best to destroy this organism and stop this organization at all costs or else the Cataclysm that we're all witnessing right now will turn into a fight with madman's fully controlled army of genetically modified horrifying mutants, some of which retain their human intelligence.
 
    My people state that they allow presence of more than 1 person if needed, take your friends or comrades, lover - if you have any of these - feel free to use their help if you are in need, but remember that this is a very dangerous endeavor and neither your or their survival is guaranteed, you have to be at least partially well-armed and have a good supply of food and medicine.
 
    It is not too late to turn back, survivor, make your choice now...

translation: 现在你已经清除了国防部-你被允许通过BL9指挥官样本来制造3级远程武器和进化的近战武器-你将在随机散布的BL9生物群落和结构中找到更多，你有一张特殊的地图

original: Now you're approaching the Grand Hall, in order to get to the Throne Room, first we must get into the Grand Hall which leads to the way to the Throne Room, but the door leading to it is tightly locked and the key is hidden somewhere...I'm yet to figure out WHERE, but I know that you have to go through and explore the only accessible room here the door to which is without locks
translation: 现在你正在接近大殿，为了到达王座室，首先我们必须进入通往王座室的大殿，但是通往它的门紧锁着，钥匙藏在某处……我还不知道在哪里，但我知道你必须穿过这里，探索这里唯一一个无障碍的房间没有锁的门

original: Oh my...how could I be so ignorant, I completely forgot that 'IT' and other nasty heavily mutated creatures had their own special domain deep down below The Island - a very caustic and a hostile to any normal living being environment, where the 'Master' and his scientists placed creatures which required 'special' conditions, be careful there!
translation: 哦，天哪…我怎么会这么无知，我完全忘记了“它”和其他严重变异的生物在岛的深处有自己的特殊领域-一个对任何正常生物都非常刻薄和敌意的领域，在那里“主人”和他的科学家们把需要“特殊”条件的生物放在那里，小心点！

translation: 哦，当你这么做的时候，我会非常感激的，小飞蛾，如果你把下面的旧地牢清除掉我那些可怜虫的脏东西，它们有点失控了……我的右手会为此给你很大的回报…

original: Once I deal with you, we will continue conducting experiments to make the process of infusing as controllable as possible - any living creature that you can possibly think of - the synthesis of BL9 with human will allow us to form ANY bioweapon!\n \n After that, we will start conquering local regions one by one - eradicating all the filth such as the Blob and Mycus and infusing every survivor that we find with BL9 - the ones that will decline our generous offer shall be annihiliated!
translation: 一旦我和你们打交道，我们将继续进行实验，使注入过程尽可能可控——你可能想到的任何生物——用人类合成BL9将允许我们形成任何生物武器！\n

original: Once you clear the remanining camps, you'll come across The Island's ancient surface ruins, apparently `Master's` soldiers under the control of his General established a little camp there fully expecting you, The General is a truly formidable foe and a force to be reckoned with, don't let them ambush you!
translation: 一旦你清除了还押营地，你会看到岛上古老的地表废墟，很明显“主人”的士兵在将军的控制下在那里建立了一个小营地，完全期待着你，将军是一个真正可怕的敌人，是一个不可忽视的力量，不要让他们伏击你！

original:
One of these types of organizations exists and it possesses tremendous military strength and many bright minds' and scientists with the help of which they've been attempting to research the samples of The Blob, technologies of Nether creatures - both have proved and still prove to be unsuccessful for them, but they are persistent - they did not give up and continued to search for more samples or technologies so that maybe, just maybe they could somehow `decipher` them.
 
    You know, I've heard many stories and rumors from survivors and about all kinds of things out there, many of which are absurd or borderline incoherent: 
 
    Strange cults that possess some sorts of magical powers who are capable of summoning beings possessed by evil spirits made of bones and plant matter, lizardmen, golems, `living` forests that are made of some strange blood or flesh-like matter that devour any unlucky wanderer that manages to get lost there, elite alien faction that conducted vile experiments on abducted humanoids that turned them into complete and mindless mutants that have fused with some alien crystals even, apparently it's infantry along with alien-robot tripods are somewhere out there spreading chaos in our world with their mutants army, even cyberdemons from hell that are armed with hi-tech weaponry who came here to conquer our realm, can you believe in all of this nonsense?
 
    Though, I'm afraid to admit that there IS one newly appeared peculiar, very bizarre but most importantly dangerous organism proof of existence of which we already have, THIS is why I'm in urgent need of your help, whoever you are, use the map that you've acquired - locate The Castle Entrance, I promise, upon reaching it, I will get in contact with you and give you more relevant explanations if you reach The Castle alive...
context:

original: Severely mutated astoundingly large, multi-legged beast. The crustacean-styled legs are all still connected to what seems to be a humanoid body, which hangs from his mutant form like a vestigial limb. His head is now attached to a long serpentine neck and is surrounded by hard, blade-like mandibles. A series of eyes are also dotted around the body, one on each joint of the legs and another large eye in it's mouth
translation: 大得惊人的变异，多腿的野兽。这些甲壳类动物的腿仍然和一个看起来像人形的身体相连，这个身体像一条残存的肢体一样悬挂在他变异的身体上。他的头现在连在一个长长的蛇形脖子上，周围是坚硬的刀片状下颌骨。身体周围还分布着一系列眼睛，腿的每个关节上都有一只眼睛，嘴里还有一只大眼睛

original:
She managed to finish them off, taking strange samples from their bodies so that our researchers could properly analyze these and figure out whether it was the already typical for many of us blob infusal or something else.
 
    The sample turned out to be a strange blob-like organism, but it was unlike blob...the resemblance to blob is only due to the way it is capable of shaping itself and rapidly mutating, but this one is like a parasitic living organism, it is capable of evolving into strange fleshy amalgamations, tentacles, worm and spider-like bodies emerging from different sides of the carrier, heavily mutilating the body of the carrier in some cases and lightly in other.
 
    Wondering how we've managed to figure this out?We had to destroy that sample even because it was somehow alive and tried to attack our scientists, so all of this knowledge does not stem from that at all...

original: So far I've managed to receive enough intel to determine what else our crazy castlelan has got up his sleeve - below you there is an old dungeon that seems to be infested with these Crawlers and God knows what else, upon reaching the end of it you'll descend into the Castle's sewer system...
translation: 到目前为止，我已经设法得到足够的情报，以确定我们疯狂的卡斯特兰还有什么秘密藏匿在他的袖子里——在你下面有一个古老的地牢，似乎到处都是这些爬虫，天知道还有什么，当你到达它的尽头时，你会掉进城堡的下水道系统…

original: So now I believe that you can guess `THEIR` plan - to create an army of perfectly obedient bio-soldiers to eradicate anyone that stands on their way and conquer these lands and try to take on the other regions, maybe even The Whole World \n \n     They MUST be stopped!They are posing a threat to our and other remaining altruistic organizations that do their best to help survivors, slow down the blob, establish SOME form of civilization, a parody of it at least, and spread our influence without spilling blood or turning everyone into vile organism controlled puppets...
translation: 所以现在我相信你可以猜到他们的计划-建立一支完全听话的生物兵军队来消灭任何一个站在他们路上的人，征服这些土地，并试图征服其他地区，甚至是全世界\n

original: So you've already heard of `IT`, `IT` - that's a grotesque amalgamation of different creatures including a human spliced up together forming a very dangerous and a deadly mutant, I believe that `IT` will be waiting for you somewhere along your way, be aware of this and use this knowledge to not be caught off guard!
translation: 所以你已经听说过‘它’，‘它’——这是不同生物的怪异融合，包括一个人拼接在一起，形成了一个非常危险和致命的变种，我相信‘它’会在你的路上某处等着你，要意识到这一点，运用这些知识不要措手不及！

original: So, you've interrupted our great ceremony and starting to massacre my people, how rude and antagonistic of you, littel moth, you seem to lack manners, I guess my humble and welcoming servants do not really fit your criteria, a company of stinky flies for you, little moth - that is what you are definitely going to appreciate!
translation: 所以，你打断了我们伟大的仪式，开始屠杀我的人民，你是多么粗鲁和敌对，小飞蛾，你似乎缺乏礼貌，我猜我谦逊和热情的仆人并不真正符合你的标准，一个臭蝇公司为你，小飞蛾-这是你一定会欣赏！

original: The Merchant is the key NPC of this mod (you find him in The Castle, The Island, various BL9 biomes and structures) - he sells weapons of 2 tiers to you for GOLD and PLATINUM coins COMBINATIONS (you automatically acquire the recipes to craft these) GComb and PComb respectively, TALK to the Merchant to acquire your first basic handgun along with the special soldering iron to repair BL9 items - the coins - you collect them from enemies as well as by finding randomly scattered treasures throughout the mod
translation: 商人是这个国防部的关键NPC（你可以在城堡、岛屿、各种BL9生物群落和建筑中找到他）-他向你出售两层武器，分别为金币和白金硬币组合（你自动获得制作这些的配方）GComb和PComb，与商人交谈，获得你的第一把基本手枪和修复BL9物品的特殊烙铁-硬币-你从敌人那里收集它们，以及通过在整个国防部随机找到分散的宝物

translation: 下一个房间的钥匙藏在一个监狱牢房里，一个叫盲爪的奇怪生物似乎被关在那里，请注意——这是一个凶猛的高个子盲人BL9增强型生物，装备有机械锋利的爪子，它相当强壮，但你一定能打败它，我相信！

original: The next rooms are hidden laboratories where `THEY` conduct their vile and inhumane experiments...I've seen the bioweapons that are kept there and I've been horrified - these are the most dangerous scums you've seen yet - incredibly tall flesh eating constantly regenerating abominations, it will take many clips to gun these scums down, be careful!
translation: 接下来的房间是隐藏的实验室，在那里“他们”进行卑鄙和不人道的实验……我见过保存在那里的生物武器，我吓坏了——这些是你见过的最危险的人渣——难以置信的高高的肉食不断再生出可憎的东西，要想把这些人渣射下来需要很多剪辑，小心！

original:
The organization that has been making attempts in gaining control over the Blob and the Nether technologies has gotten into contact with the The Castlelan to our great surprise, The Castlelan gave away some of the samples to them due to all the trouble that it brought to him turning his servants and guards into zombie-like creatures, obviously in exchange for organization's protection, constant supply of resources and one more horrible thing...
 
    The samples were quickly delivered to this their base of operation, in mere weeks they have managed to understand the deadly and powerful potential of that organism that they have managed to acquire, the fundamental knowledge that they've gained is that the ones who were infected with the ordinary samples turned into mindless aggressive felsh-eating beings, but considering the resemblance with The Blob, there IS a possibility of controlling these beings and turning them into minions.
 
    Altering the DNA and forcing mutations of the samples that they've received they finally managed to create a special type of this organism that they've named BL9 that is capable of controlling the beings who were infused with the ordinary types, still retaining their intelligence, now their terrible dream came true - they have created a pretty much fully controllable biological weapon...
context:

original: The process of infusion has been completed successfully, now I possess the power that I devoted myself ENTIRELY to, to make it as close to extraterrestrial as possible, now that I can feel it - I realize how much I underestimated it!You will feel it too - you will be forcefully infused with it, either with or without your destruction, NO ESCAPE NOW!
translation: 输液的过程已经成功地完成了，现在我拥有了我全身心投入的力量，让它尽可能地接近外星，现在我能感觉到它——我意识到我是多么地低估了它！你也会感受到它-你将被强有力地注入它，无论你是否被毁灭，现在没有逃脱的可能！

original: They have created few of these special `commander` samples, possibly infusing their generals or key players, definitely The Castlelan himself as well because he has shown immense interest in these due to his occult beliefs, there are some more details to this.\n \n    The details is that we are not exactly sure what else they have done with these samples, they might have created more different, heavily mutated types, to create stronger minions, something that will be used in cases when a more destructive, more powerful force is needed, I'm unaware whether they have 'kindly' provided The Castlelan with some of these, and how many of them are here or what they are currently working on in their main facilities, but they DO exist, so you have to be on watch, these are very strong and deadly creatures with their unique `traits`

original:
This Castle - an enormous magnificent work of art of medievals' engineers, many generations of castlelans were living here pretty much in total isolation from the outer world, they mostly exploited their own rural lands and villages for constant supply of food and water, barely communicating with the modern civilization.
 
    I've heard many rumors about them - that they are dealing with occult beliefs, have created their own religion, do sacrifices even, believing in the `returning` of some kind of a chaotic deity that would destroy our entire world's human population, it's civilization entirely to restore the balance, build a new world, a new civilization with the aid of that deity.
 
    Not a long while after the Cataclysm, thanks to our portable radars and scout drones we have noticed some very strong signal interferences that not only jammed everything but burned to the crisp both our radars and drones, the magnitude and the radius of the EMP damage was incredibly big, unlike any interference we've ever seen.
 
    Eventually we've found out that the cause of this was a shimmering portal appearing for a certain amount of time in the mines under that Castle, which spawned a new type of blob it seems that by this time has already fully infused with the inhabitants of The Castle, one of our spies pretending to be a goods trader managed to lure out some of the guards outside, as soon as she approached them, they attacked her in a very aggressive manner trying to eat her flesh murmuring some strange gibberish...

original: You are in the sewers - great, but BEWARE, Castlelan is not joking about his Right Hand, it's not a mere crazed cultist, it is a tall lizard-skinned incredibly agile and deadly creature that is capable of hiding in the shadows, one of `THEIR` bioweapons it seems, it guards the path to the mines below, use your wits and skills to DESTROY it!
translation: 你在下水道里-很好，但是要小心，卡斯特兰不是在开他的右手玩笑，它不是一个疯狂的邪教分子，它是一个高大的蜥蜴皮肤，非常敏捷和致命的生物，能够隐藏在阴影中，似乎是他们的一种生物武器，它守卫着通往下面地雷的道路，用你的智慧和技能摧毁它！
context:

translation: 你现在真让我吃惊，你甚至连我最忠诚的将军都被淘汰了——反正损失不大，如果需要的话，我还会有几十个，最后一座岛的要塞矗立着——它会让你放慢速度，让我完全注入BL9

translation: 你被赋予了一个选择——你的选择很糟糕，愚蠢——而现在这将带来严重的后果，你将无法从军事基地活着逃脱——在它下面等待你的是你想象不到的！

original: You have managed to enter `OUR` base of operations - the militarized Island guarded by very well-trained biologically enhanced soldiers armed to teeth, plenty of which are heavily mutated having inhumane strength and agility, that Castle - that was a mere cult controlled by an archaic madman - I would have got rid of them myself upon starting our conquest, but you've done me a good favor, the first time - the last time, survivor...
translation: 你成功地进入了“我们的”作战基地——这座军事化的岛屿，由训练有素的生物强化士兵守卫着，他们武装到牙齿，其中许多人都有着非人的力量和敏捷，大量变异，这座城堡——那只是一个由古老的疯子控制的邪教——我在开始我们的战斗时会自己除掉他们征服，但你帮了我一个大忙，第一次-最后一次，幸存者…

original: You have reached the destination, I am glad to see you alive!Infiltrating the Island you will come across camps, some small military structures - but that's just the tip of the iceberg - the only way to get inside of The Island's bunker and more elaborate structures is via water caves
translation: 你已经到达目的地了，我很高兴看到你活着！渗透到岛上，你会看到营地，一些小型军事建筑——但这只是冰山一角——进入岛上碉堡和更复杂建筑的唯一途径是通过水洞

original: You have witnessed our work of art - incredibly fast regenerating humanoids - with enough time, we can make truly immortal humans, extend humans' limits, you cannot even conceive of what power you may achieve!Think of this - how about you stop while you still can, turn your back on this wanna-be-heroic bunch of fools and become a part of my personal army - so we can establish The New Order together, huh?
translation: 你已经见证了我们的艺术作品——难以置信的快速再生的类人机器人——只要有足够的时间，我们就能创造出真正不朽的人类，扩展人类的极限，你甚至无法想象你能获得什么样的力量！想一想-趁你还可以的时候停下来，把这帮想成为英雄的傻瓜抛在脑后，成为我个人军队的一部分-这样我们就可以一起建立新秩序了，嗯？

original:
You're probably wondering who I am - I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed pre-Cataclysm.I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization, they had predicted the Cataclysm long before it occurred.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been  training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence and survival of our organization and my people...
context:
ID: BL9_agent_journal1
位于 /Kenan-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json

original: You've gotten far, I have to admit this, but it all ends here, you won't escape alive from my mind-boggling garden full of surprises, besides, the annoying squashable bugs is not the only thing you are going to see here in my Castle...
translation: 你已经走得很远了，我不得不承认这一点，但一切都在这里结束了，你不会从我那令人难以置信的充满惊喜的花园里活着逃走，况且，在我的城堡里，你会看到的不仅仅是那些烦人的臭虫…
context:
ID: BL9_castlelan_note3
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json

original: Your foolishness and stubbornness has no end, there's no stopping it!Now even I am involved into this!You do know that you're prolonging the Cataclysm with your actions?The BL9 is the only way to stop this and end BOTH the Blob and Mycus, restore the civilization but ONLY with the worthy society - everyone else that falls short of our expectations shall be eradicated!
translation: 你的愚蠢和固执是没有尽头的，没有办法阻止它！现在连我都被牵扯进来了！你知道你在用你的行动延长灾难吗？BL9是阻止这一切的唯一途径，结束了这一切，恢复了文明，但只有建立了一个有价值的社会——所有不符合我们期望的人都将被铲除！

original: With gold and platinum coin COMBINATIONs of course! Check your 'OTHER' recipes in your PDA or your Notebook or whatever. You need to collect gold and platinum coins, then craft these combinations - each combination of gold or platinum requires 100 pieces of the CORRESPONDING type - 100 gold is needed to craft 1 gold coin combination, 100 platinum is neede to craft 1 platinum coin combination, stranger! To buy Tier 2 gear you need to have the Tier 1 variant of the same gear in your inventory as well
translation: 当然是黄金和白金硬币组合！在你的PDA或笔记本或其他地方查看你的“其他”食谱。你需要收集黄金和白金硬币，然后制作这些组合——黄金或白金的每个组合需要100枚对应的类型——制作1枚金币组合需要100枚黄金，制作1枚白金硬币组合需要100枚白金，陌生人！要购买2级装备，你需要在你的库存中有相同装备的1级变体

original:
<color_yellow>Gigantic sci-fi action adventure expansion mod </color>

 <color_light_cyan> Huge exotic locations - The Tainted Medieval Castle, Huge Abandoned Industrial Facilities, The Secret Organization's Militarized Island, Lush and Fortified Biomes, Aliens' Mobile Bases (15 custom structures ranging from gigantic to huge!)</color>,<color_red> vile and horribly mutated dangerous monsters, mutants, aliens, advanced aliens</color>
 <color_light_blue> New custom modern and hi-tech weapons (ballistics too!) along with armor of different tiers. Tiers of artifacts (a lot of them!) that buff skills, stats. Deep lore system in a form of scattered intel, journals </color>
 <color_light_blue> Adds locations, items and monsters with lore inspired by iconic Resident Evil series made by Capcom along with Half Life series as well</color>
translation:
<color_yellow>大型科幻动作冒险扩展模组</color> 

 <color_light_cyan>巨大的异域特色地点 - 腐化的中世纪城堡、巨大的废弃工业设施、秘密组织的军事化岛屿、茂盛和布防的生物群落、外星移动基地（15个定制结构，除了大，只有更大！）</color>，<color_red>可憎可怕的变异危险怪物、变种人、外星人、高级外星人</color>
<color_light_blue>全新定制的现代高科技武器（还有弹道武器！）以及不同等级的盔甲。不同等级的神器（很多！）强化技能、属性。深层背景系统以分散的情报、期刊形式呈现</color> 
 <color_light_blue>添加了地点、物品和怪物，其背景受Capcom制作的标志性的生化危机系列以及半衰期系列</color>

original: Biomes, so we call these areas of meteorites' impact, apparently, not only BL9 but other various alien microorganisms, minerals, liquids and gases have entered soils and Earth's atmosphere in places of impact as well, causing pollutions and creation of strangely colored biomes, a lot of valuable materials can be salvaged from there.\n \n    However, we are not the only ones who seek them and these places are quite infested with peculiar creatures as well
translation: 生物群落，所以我们称之为陨石撞击的这些区域，显然，不仅是BL9，还有其他各种外来微生物、矿物、液体和气体也进入了撞击地点的土壤和地球大气层，造成了污染，并创造了奇异颜色的生物群落，许多有价值的物质可以从那里被打捞上来。然而，我们并不是唯一寻找它们的人，这些地方也充满了奇特的生物

original: Hmm, 'Cult' is a moderately spread occult group led by this strange man living in a gigantic Castle with countless amount of servants in isolation, they practice horrible occult beliefs with human sacrifices, cleansing one's blood with barely edible and strange things and drugs that they produce themselves, possibly even cannibalism but not exactly sure, to be honest.\n \n    They have allied with 'THEM' in exchange for more advanced BL9 samples that Castlelan has already come across and started to forcefully infuse his servants with, believing that BL9 is a blood or remnant of some sorts of their chaotic war deity, valuable sign for them
translation: 嗯，"邪教"是一个传播较广的神秘团体，由这个奇怪的人领导，他居住在一座巨大的城堡里，有无数被隔离的仆人，他们用人类的牺牲来实践可怕的神秘信仰，用自己生产的几乎不能吃的奇怪的东西和药物来净化自己的血液，甚至可能是食人族，但老实说，还不完全确定。\n\n他们与“他们”结盟，交换卡斯特兰已经接触到的更先进的BL9样本，并开始向他的仆人强行注入，相信BL9是他们混乱的战神的血液或残余，对他们来说是有价值的标志。

translation: 嗯，‘他们’对我们来说是一个敌对组织，他们以可怕和不人道的方式利用Blob、Mycus、Triffids、BL9来创建一支顺从的变种人军队，目的是先征服局部地区，然后征服整个地球，与所有平民建立某种‘新秩序’，变种人被注入BL9，并且完全服从他们的领导人和某种策划人，实际上是疯子

original: Honestly, Arganoides are interested mainly in using it as a high quality fuel for their spaceships, more efficient locating tech for acquiring rare valuable items. Wanzeltiums want to use it for creating more durable and unique building materials, improving their existing tech and weapons via infusing it with BL9.\n \n    Davranides crave to significantly advance their existent mutation, splicing research in an attempt to make their race genetically superior via their own efforts. Saldeniums show interest in upgrading their armor and weapons with it, enhancing their current energy-based physically boosting accessories with BL9 to provide even greater strength to them, of course, creating BL9 monstrosities to instill fear into their enemies and conquer them
translation: 老实说，阿甘诺德主要感兴趣的是将其用作飞船的高质量燃料，这是获取稀有贵重物品的更有效定位技术。万泽尔提乌斯想用它来制造更耐用和独特的建筑材料，通过注入BL9来改进他们现有的技术和武器。\n\n达夫拉尼德斯渴望显著提高他们现有的突变、剪接研究，试图通过自己的努力使他们的种族在遗传上更优越。萨尔德尼昂对升级他们的盔甲和武器很感兴趣，用BL9增强他们当前基于能量的物理增强配件，为他们提供更大的力量，当然，创造BL9怪物是为了向他们的敌人灌输恐惧并征服他们、

original: Honestly, it's nowhere to be found when they've created their civilizations, but presence of hostile fauna, pretty harsh environmental conditions, all of this would have hindered their progress sufficiently, but they've found a unique source of energy on each of their planets.\n \n    They've learned how to use it as advanced craft material, a type of a fuel, even learning how to use it as weapons, conjuring energy mass to use against their enemies, it boosts their physical capabilities, crystalline glow that they have is due to them possessing this energy as well
translation: 老实说，当他们创造了自己的文明时，哪里也找不到，但敌对动物的存在，相当恶劣的环境条件，所有这些都会充分阻碍他们的进步，但他们在各自的行星上找到了独特的能源。\n\n他们已经学会了如何使用它作为先进的飞行器材料，一种燃料，甚至还学会了如何使用它作为武器，召唤能量来对付敌人，它提高了他们的物理能力，他们拥有的水晶般的光芒也是因为他们拥有这种能量

original:
I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed before Cataclysm. I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones. However, our own leader betrayed us, selling us to 'THEM', hoping to be one of 'THEIR' allies in New World that 'THEY' want to build.
 
    'THEY' have killed, abducted many of our people, but many of us have also managed to escape. We've made a secret BL9 research base thanks to Ulysses along with many of our scientists who believe that we can modify it to be safe, beneficial even to use for equipment or even drugs. I try to do my best to strive if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence along with survival of our organization, my people...
translation:
我是一名特工，在大灾难前存在的许多秘密组织的残余组织中工作。我出生在它的一个主要隐蔽设施里，我父亲是一名退休军官，被雇佣为雇佣军，长期为这个组织工作。

显然，这样的组织有很多隐藏的设施、金库、许多不同的结构、难以置信的资源来喂养和供应几代幸存者及其代理人的后代。

多年来，我一直在努力训练，不仅要成为一名幸存者和拾荒者，还要成为一名能够搜索和拾荒者，寻找稀有资源和基本资源的特工。然而，我们自己的领导人背叛了我们，把我们卖给了“他们”，希望成为“他们”想要建立的新世界中的“他们”盟友之一。

“他们”杀害、绑架了我们的许多人，但我们中的许多人也设法逃脱了。多亏了尤利西斯和我们的许多科学家，我们已经建立了一个秘密的BL9研究基地，他们相信我们可以将其修改为安全的，甚至有益于用于设备甚至药物。我尽我最大的努力奋斗，即使不是为了繁荣昌盛，但至少是为了我们组织、我的人民的生存而继续生存......
context:
ID: BL9_agent_journal1
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=BL9_agent_journal1

original: I honestly try to not hide valuable info from my colleagues, but only 3 people: Agent, Ulysses, I know about this. Just can't trust everyone, I'm an exile to Davranides, one of alien invaders to humans. My brethren have developed a unique technology: Energy Shield Generators that create a gigantic energy field based on sources that we've found on our planet, along with other 3 races. This field can protect people from horrors of Cataclysm, keeping even 'Alliance' militia away, shields are this strong.\n \n    An important theory I have is that if we acquire all 4 shield generators, it will create an energy field that can be much stronger than a single field, using all 4 energy sources. If Ulysses' child, Subject5, is clever enough with putting intel or journals, armed survivors may help us to cleanse all of these areas that I've marked on this map in exactly this order. We lack military, we're trying to repel 'THEIR' attacks as much as we can, we clearly need help from survivors as well
translation: 老实说，我尽量不向同事隐瞒有价值的信息，但只有三个人：特工，尤利西斯，我知道这件事。只是不能相信所有人，我是被流放到达夫拉尼德斯的人，人类的外来入侵者之一。我的兄弟们开发了一种独特的技术：能量屏蔽发生器，它根据我们在地球上发现的资源以及其他3个种族，创造出一个巨大的能量场。这个区域可以保护人们免受灾难的恐怖，甚至可以让“联盟”民兵远离，盾牌就是这么强大。\n\n我的一个重要理论是，如果我们获得全部4个屏蔽发生器，它将产生一个能量场，比使用全部4种能源的单个场强得多。如果尤利西斯的孩子，受试者5，足够聪明地放置情报或日志，武装幸存者可能会帮助我们清理我在这张地图上按照这个顺序标记的所有区域。我们缺乏军事力量，我们正在尽可能地击退“他们”的袭击，我们显然也需要幸存者的帮助
context:
ID: BL9_davran_journal3
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

original: I've grown in one of our organization's core centers, my father is a bright very experienced symbiotes scientist, yet he's a very kind, humane person, he wants me to be a scientist. My mother is a former scientist who mutated into a very graceful plant humanoid, retaining most of her humanity. She abandoned us, because she feared of what our own people could do to our family for having a mutant as a member of our organization. Years after I've grown indifferent to my father's work.\n \n    'THEY' attacked our core center, our own leader betrayed all of us. Hundreds of our people killed, kidnapped, abducted. Hundreds of mutated soldiers, vile creatures with inhumane strength and agility. Some of us escaped like my father with some scientists, workers and our main agent. I didn't follow them, running to labs, I've injected myself with one of experimental symbiotes, BL9, my father has been working on it for years. Managed to use my new abilities to escape, alone. I search for remnants of our organization, I know they exist, I know they along with my father have survived. With this intel, journals, survivors could help me, our organization to fight our enemies successfully hopefully as well
translation: 我生长在我们组织的核心中心之一，我父亲是一位聪明、经验丰富的共生生物科学家，但他是一位非常善良、人道的人，他希望我成为一名科学家。我母亲是一位前科学家，她变异成一种非常优雅的植物类人，保留了她的大部分人性。她抛弃了我们，因为她担心我们自己的人会因为有一个变种人加入我们的组织而对我们的家庭造成什么影响。在我对父亲的工作漠不关心多年之后。\n\n他们袭击了我们的核心中心，我们的领导人背叛了我们所有人。数百人被杀，被绑架，被绑架。数百名变异士兵，邪恶的生物，拥有非人的力量和敏捷。我们中的一些人像我父亲一样，带着一些科学家、工人和我们的主要代理人逃走了。我没有跟着他们跑去实验室，我给自己注射了一种实验性的共生生物BL9，我父亲已经研究了很多年了。设法利用我的新能力独自逃跑。我寻找我们组织的残余，我知道他们的存在，我知道他们和我父亲一起幸存了下来。有了这些情报，期刊，幸存者们可以帮助我，我们的组织也有望成功地与敌人作战
context:
ID: BL9_subject5_journal1
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

original: I've grown without father, like majority of Davranides families, we breed or 'fuck', they feed us a drug that cleanses love, affection hormones, amplifying pleasure hormones, no love or affection allowed, it confuses minds they say. A bright child, I've got education in a prestigious university, worked at one of our top symbiotes research centers, learned a lot from our female mentor, she has shown me her personal projects, hidden from authorities, beneficial drugs, not just symbiote weapons. We've developed forbidden affection, love, got lost in it but we were happy.\n \n    One of our authorities suspects it, frames my mentor, she gets killed, my own people destroy trust I had for them. Years after I'm a scientist. This fucktard confronts me, tells me I should be grateful he didn't frame me, I tell him all I think about him. We fight, he forcefully injects me with an experimental symbiote. I brutally smash fuckard into a pulp with my tentacle hammers. I escape via 'Alliance' portal to Earth, meanwhile, I disguise as a human, I try to help a friendly organization to rebuild. Search for love, tell 'fuck off' to everyone else who prevents you from doing so. Find him or her. Be happy. I still search for my love with hope as well
translation: 我的成长过程中没有父亲，就像大多数达夫拉尼德斯家族一样，我们繁衍后代或“操”，他们给我们喂食一种能净化爱、情感荷尔蒙、放大快乐荷尔蒙的药物，不允许爱或情感，他们说，这让人困惑。我是一个聪明的孩子，在一所著名的大学接受教育，在我们顶尖的共生生物研究中心工作，从我们的女导师那里学到了很多东西，她向我展示了她的个人项目，对当局隐瞒，有益的药物，而不仅仅是共生生物武器。我们发展了被禁止的感情，爱情，迷失在其中，但我们很快乐。\n\n我们的一个当局怀疑，陷害了我的导师，她被杀了，我自己的人破坏了我对他们的信任。在我成为科学家多年之后。这个混蛋面对我，告诉我应该感谢他没有陷害我，我告诉他我对他的所有想法。我们打架，他强行给我注射了一种实验性的共生体。我用我的触角锤残忍地把fuckard砸成了一个果肉。我通过“联盟”门户逃往地球，同时，我伪装成人类，试图帮助一个友好组织重建。寻找爱，告诉所有阻止你这样做的人“滚开”。找到他或她。要快乐。我仍然带着希望寻找我的爱
context:
ID: BL9_davran_journal2
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json

original: It's a sentient, very intelligent alien symbiote that has managed to appear on Earth via space warp gate, portals here, meteorites as well. It's only way of survival is via finding a host causing a symbiosis, depending on many factors including BL9's attitude towards it's hosts, what type of BL9 it is, whether BL9's structure was artificially changed somehow.\n \n    Symbiosis can be benign and even protective granting it's host inhumane powers, protection even or lead to all kinds of incredible mutations leading to host going feral, mad pretty much, latter is something that 'THEY' often utilize to create an army of mindless obedient mutants as well
translation: 它是一种有感知力的、非常聪明的外星共生体，通过空间扭曲门、这里的入口以及陨石成功地出现在地球上。它唯一的生存方式是找到一个引起共生的宿主，这取决于许多因素，包括BL9对它的宿主的态度，BL9的类型，BL9的结构是否被人为改变。\n\n如果宿主具有不人道的能力，那么共生关系可以是良性的，甚至是保护性的。保护甚至会导致各种令人难以置信的突变，导致宿主变得野性、疯狂，后者也是“他们”经常利用的东西，来创造一支无意识、顺从的突变体大军
context:
ID: BL9_intel_uniquesymbiote1

original: It's an alliance of 4 advanced alien civilizations, Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums, their main reason of allying is supporting each other for successful survival on ravaged Earth considering presence of all these hostile creatures here, most important thing to them is BL9, they are obsessed with it, they seek it diligently.\n \n    They've learned that alien symbiotes are capable of granting their hosts incredible abilities, they've learned that BL9 is incredibly advanced, capable of being greatly modified, they've somehow learned that it is present on Earth, this is why they're here as well
translation: 这是一个由4个先进的外星文明组成的联盟，阿加诺文明、万泽尔提乌斯文明、达夫拉尼德斯文明、萨尔德尼文明，他们结盟的主要原因是为了在饱受蹂躏的地球上成功生存而相互支持考虑到这里所有这些敌对生物的存在，对他们来说最重要的是BL9，他们着迷于它，他们孜孜不倦地寻找它。\n\n他们了解到外星共生生物能够赋予它们的宿主难以置信的能力，他们了解到BL9非常先进，能够被极大地修改，他们不知何故了解到它存在于地球上，这就是为什么他们也在这里

original: Our civilization is one of the greatest examples of our race's pragmatism. We build magnificent structures, advanced technologies, weapons, armor based on inventions of our dedicated scientists and engineers. We must be proud, of our government, of us being superior to majority of other races, of us essentially monopolizing tech market in our and local galaxy systems.\n \n    Ways of conquering for us are via diplomacy, money, financial enslavements, dependency of others on us, this we use for our own advantage. Not really proud to work with a bunch of space pirates, Arganoides, neither with blood craving, killing for sport or whatever savages, Saldeniums. However, Davranides...are obsessed with their genetical splicing and deep science...we must not tread on them, be allies, but keep an eye on them obviously
translation: 我们的文明是我们种族实用主义的最好例子之一。我们建立宏伟的结构，先进的技术，武器，盔甲的基础上，我们致力于科学家和工程师的发明。我们必须为我们的政府感到自豪，为我们优于大多数其他种族感到自豪，为我们基本上垄断了我们和当地银河系的技术市场感到自豪。\n\n对我们来说，征服的方式是通过外交手段、金钱、金融奴役、他人对我们的依赖，这是我们为了自己的利益而利用的。与一群太空海盗，阿尔加诺人一起工作并不自豪，也不为嗜血、为运动而杀人或其他野蛮人萨尔德尼而自豪。然而，达夫拉尼德斯......被他们的基因拼接和深入的科学所困扰......我们绝不能践踏他们，成为盟友，但要密切关注他们
context:

original: These alien species are native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet of Wanzeltiums, Ulniviunite are pangolin-like creatures, they breed and live in sandy cave areas located on shores of this planet, they have a body covered with slime coated thick and durable scales, underbelly and tail grotesquely fleshy and slimy, lamprey-type mouth with a menacingly looking set of teeth, long anteater-like tongue along with incredibly thick and sturdy claws on the end of it's limbs.\n \n    Obviously Wanzeltiums have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation: 这些外星物种原产于美丽而茂密的丛林般的野生森林星球万泽尔提乌斯，乌尔尼维乌斯是穿山甲般的生物，它们在这个星球海岸的沙质洞穴地区繁殖和生活，它们的身体覆盖着黏液覆盖的厚而耐用的鳞片，腹部和尾部肉质和黏液怪异，七鳃鳗型的嘴，长着一副威胁性的牙齿，长长的食蚁兽般的舌头，四肢末端有着难以置信的粗而结实的爪子。\n\n很明显，万泽尔提乌斯把它们带到了这里，可能是为了把它们作为注射BL9的实验对象，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心地接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了变异

original: These alien species are native to a beautiful water planet of Davranides, Inhravtidius resemble crustacean-like creatures, they breed and live in caves, corrals of this planet, they have a thick curved carapace, 2 antennas protruding from their heads, multiple eyes, quickly moving tiny legs and 2 sharp and spiked pincers.\n \n    Obviously Davranides have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation: 这些外来物种原产于美丽的水上星球达夫拉尼德斯，因赫拉夫蒂迪乌斯与甲壳类动物相似，它们在这个星球的洞穴、畜栏中繁殖和生活，它们有一个厚而弯曲的甲壳，两个天线从头部伸出，多只眼睛，快速移动的小腿和两个尖尖的钳子。\n\n显然，达夫拉尼德斯把它们带到了这里，可能是因为用它们作为注射BL9的实验对象，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了变异。

original: These alien species are native to a swamp-like shrouded by glowing purple fog of some sorts planet of Arganoides, Yengnutrium are insectoids resembling a strange mix of mantises and locusts, they breed and live in dryer underground cave systems of this planet, they have an elongated body, 2 antennas protruding from their heads, multiple eyes, many of them may have wings and 2 sharp serrated claws.\n \n    Obviously Arganoides have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation: 这些外来物种原产于一个类似沼泽的地方，周围笼罩着某种发光的紫色雾气的Arganoides星球，英努特里姆是一种昆虫类，类似于螳螂和蝗虫的奇怪混合体，它们在这个星球干燥的地下洞穴系统中繁殖和生活，它们有一个细长的身体，两个天线从头部伸出，多个眼睛，它们中的许多可能有翅膀和两个锋利的锯齿状爪子。\n\n显然，Arganoides将它们带到了这里，可能是为了将它们用作注射BL9的实验对象，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心地接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了突变

original: These alien species are native to a volcanic canyons barren wasteland-like planet of Saldeniums, Ezrondium are arachnides resembling gigantic spiders, they breed and live in sandy cave areas located on shores of this planet, they have an enormous body from belly of which emerges a small worm-like protrusion, incredibly sharp and deadly looking elongated legs.\n \n    Obviously Saldeniums have brought them here, possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9 since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here, we must approach them carefully, if they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well
translation: 这些外来物种原产于火山峡谷贫瘠的荒地，如萨尔德尼星球，埃兹隆迪姆是类似巨型蜘蛛的蛛形纲动物，它们在位于该星球海岸的沙质洞穴中繁殖和生活，它们有一个巨大的身体，腹部有一个小蠕虫状突起，令人难以置信的锋利和致命的长腿。\n\n显然，萨尔德尼把它们带到了这里，可能是为了把它们作为实验对象来注射BL9，因为这是“联盟”在这里的主要原因，我们必须小心地接近它们，如果它们被注射了BL9，那么它们中的许多肯定也发生了变异。

original: They call themselves 'Alliance', 4 alien tribes from different planets who have managed to turn into actual advanced alien civilizations with the help of unique energy sources on their planets that they've learned to use as advanced craft material, a type of a fuel, even learning to use it as weapons, conjuring energy mass to use against their enemies. Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well
translation: 他们称自己为“联盟”，4个来自不同星球的外星部落，借助于他们星球上独特的能源，他们已经学会了将其用作先进的工艺材料，一种燃料，甚至学会了将其用作武器，召唤能量来对付敌人。阿尔加诺、万泽尔提乌斯、达夫拉尼德斯、萨尔德尼等

original: This Cataclysm, mutants, weird creatures, bandits, aliens, cults, really vile organizations, 'Alliance', all of this changes us with time. Survival becomes our main priority. We kill, we destroy, we don't trust anyone. Some forget what conscience is even. There is still a hope, many of these horrors or microorganisms can be used to our advantage, such as equipment based on alien technologies, creating healthy mutations or drugs based on modified microorganisms to make them benign, to fend off anything that corrupts us.\n \n    I don't know if we can still love or have children, but we must try, we all must try. I believe that we have a tiny bit of God's energy within us. With it we don't get entirely corrupted by vile sources, retaining our humane side. Based on this, we need to survive, to ascertain that ideas of good, hope, ethics, love will not be obsolete as well
translation: 这场大灾难，突变体，奇怪的生物，土匪，外星人，邪教，真正邪恶的组织，“联盟”，所有这些都随着时间的推移而改变我们。生存成为我们的首要任务。我们杀人，我们毁灭，我们不相信任何人。有些人甚至忘记了什么是良心。我们仍然有希望，这些恐怖或微生物中的许多可以用于我们的优势，例如基于外星技术的设备，创造健康的突变或基于改良微生物的药物，使其变得良性，以抵御任何腐蚀我们的东西。\n\n我不知道我们是否还能爱孩子，但我们必须尝试，我们都必须尝试。我相信我们内心有一点点上帝的能量。有了它，我们就不会被邪恶的消息来源完全腐蚀，保留我们人性的一面。基于此，我们需要生存，以确定善、希望、道德、爱的观念也不会过时
context:
ID: BL9_subject5_journal2
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

物品浏览器：

original: This strange liquified being, it gives inhumane powers to whoever consumes it. Our miners in mines of our Great Castlelan's Creation managed to find it, some consumed it instantly out of curiousity they had. It killed ones who were not worthy of our Deity's magnificent blessing, but it gave incredible powers to ones worthy of it.\n \n    We believe this to be a blood of our Deity, a blessing given to us, means to mark us as worthy warriors to destroy heretics, anyone who opposes creation of New World, who disregards our beliefs, who presumes us to be madmen. We must fight fools and obstacles on our way, our vile enemies
translation: 这种奇怪的液化生物，无论谁食用它，它都会给人不人道的力量。在我们伟大的卡斯特兰创造的矿井里，我们的矿工们设法找到了它，一些人出于好奇，立即把它吃掉了。它杀死了那些不值得我们的神伟大祝福的人，但它给了那些值得祝福的人不可思议的力量。\n\n我们相信这是我们神的血液，是给予我们的祝福，这意味着我们是有价值的战士，可以消灭异端，任何反对创造新世界的人，任何无视我们信仰的人，任何认为我们是疯子的人。我们必须与路上的愚人和障碍作斗争，我们邪恶的敌人

original: We all contribute to our society's advancing. Genetical splicing of microorganisms, creation of mutagens along with drugs based on their properties, lots of work on peculiar ones, such as symbiotes, we excel at all of this. Our society does it's best to 'direct' our own people to the right way, even if it means prohibitions or strict rules to abide by for our own citizens. Some fools even say, 'exploiting' or simply 'experimenting on' inferior races, it's for their own good, it's for our own society's good.\n \n    Our government, our diligently working scientists, researchers, subjects, all work for the sake of Davranides' future of all of us united with no traces of opposition between us. With BL9, a unique, flexible, powerful symbiote, we will be able to alter our own race genetically to be the dominant race across hundreds of galaxies. Calculating Wanzeltiums with other races all across galaxies depending on them will be our mere slaves when we use BL9 to advance our race as well
translation: 我们都为社会进步做出了贡献。微生物的基因剪接，根据其特性产生诱变剂和药物，对特殊的诱变剂（如共生体）进行大量研究，我们在所有这些方面都很擅长。我们的社会最好是“引导”我们自己的人民走上正确的道路，即使这意味着我们自己的公民必须遵守禁令或严格的规则。有些傻瓜甚至说，‘利用’或只是‘试验’劣等种族，这是为了他们自己的利益，也是为了我们自己的社会的利益。\n\n我们的政府，我们勤奋工作的科学家、研究人员、研究对象，都是为了达夫拉尼德斯的未来而工作的，我们大家团结一致，没有任何反对的迹象。有了BL9，一种独特、灵活、强大的共生体，我们将能够从基因上改变我们自己的种族，成为数百个星系中的主导种族。当我们使用BL9来推进我们的种族时，计算万泽尔提乌斯和所有星系中依赖它们的其他种族将仅仅是我们的奴隶
context:
ID: BL9_davran_journal1
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#BL9-100%25_monster_resilience_version→GENERIC→BL9_davran_journal1
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=BL9_davran_journal1

original: We are led by one of the brightest minds that exists during our times. The only way to rebuild this world is via infusing people with BL9, creating disciplined, fully obedient hosts ranging from regular civilians to physically enhanced soldiers and even mutated amalgamations to use as our elite soldiers.\n \n    Also, based on BL9's properties, it counters The Blob, Triffids, Mycus entirely, being absolutely benign, with a few tweaks of course, compared to others. With huge amounts of resources, weapons, materials, workforce including scientists and engineers, we can expand, assert dominance across local areas then with enough hosts, across entire country, then even across the world
translation: 我们是由我们这个时代最聪明的人领导的。重建这个世界的唯一途径是向人们灌输BL9，创造纪律严明、完全服从的主人，从普通平民到体能增强的士兵，甚至将变异的混编部队用作我们的精英士兵。\n\n同样，基于BL9的属性，它完全对抗了变形怪、三尖树和马卡斯，是绝对良性的，当然，与其他的相比，有一些调整。有了大量的资源、武器、材料、劳动力，包括科学家和工程师，我们可以在本地区、在全国、甚至全世界范围内扩张、维护主导地位
context:
ID: BL9_theirsoldier_journal1
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#BL9-100%25_monster_resilience_version→GENERIC→BL9_theirsoldier_journal1
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=BL9_theirsoldier_journal1

original: We change as we advance. In terms of our technological advancements, no other race is match for us, but this turns us into cruel, devious, calculating tyrants slowly. We've monopolized tech markets successfully in our, also in local galaxy systems. We've grown proud of ourselves so much that conquered races are shunned upon by our native citizens, exploited by local companies as slaves.\n \n    This entire attempt to seize BL9 on a ravaged planet, killing everyone on sight including humans, proves my point. We've formed an 'Alliance' with 'adventurers' or pirates, Arganoides. We deal with violent wars waging warriors and mercenaries, Saldeniums. Though, Davranides are the most shady of them all. I've never seen a race so obsessed with genetical splicing or mutations, I've heard stories of how tyrannical their superiors are, 'directing' all of their citizens according to their own world view as well
translation: 我们随着前进而改变。就我们的技术进步而言，没有其他种族能与我们匹敌，但这让我们慢慢变成了残忍、狡猾、精打细算的暴君。我们已经成功地垄断了我们的技术市场，也垄断了当地的银河系统。我们为自己感到骄傲，以至于被征服的种族被我们的本土公民排斥，被当地公司当作奴隶剥削。\n\n在一个被蹂躏的星球上夺取BL9，杀死包括人类在内的所有人的整个企图证明了我的观点。我们已经与“冒险家”或海盗阿加诺伊德结成了“联盟”。我们对付的是由战士和雇佣兵发动的暴力战争。不过，达夫拉尼德斯是其中最阴暗的。我从未见过一个种族如此痴迷于基因剪接或突变，我也听说过他们的上级是多么残暴，他们根据自己的世界观“指挥”所有的公民
context:
ID: BL9_wanzel_journal2
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/BL9-100%_monster_resilience_version/Items/lore.json
类型为 GENERIC

original: We represent a secret organization that has existed pre-Cataclysm as well, our current goals are researching peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids, without a doubt finding efficient ways to survive, restore our former main hub's glory, make some kind of a safe place for people to live, work, love in as well.\n \n    It will take a lot of time especially with fending off these invaders, dealing with these microorganisms and experimenting on mutations to possibly find a way to counter it somehow
translation: 我们代表着一个在大灾难前就存在的秘密组织，我们目前的目标是研究特殊的外来微生物、矿物、气体和液体，毫无疑问，找到有效的生存方式，恢复我们以前的主要中心的荣耀，为人们的生活、工作和爱情创造一个安全的地方。\n\n这将花费大量时间，尤其是抵御这些入侵者、处理这些微生物和进行突变试验，以找到某种对抗它的方法。
context:

original: We specialize in research in terms of learning about inner structure and uses of peculiar alien microorganisms, minerals, gases and liquids, including The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, BL9 but mostly BL9 these days because out of all of them, BL9 is the most unique, flexible, relatively easily to affect and alter, change it's structure.\n \n    It's unique abilities can lead to horrible mutations or possibly some kind of a cure or protection from other microorganisms as well
translation: 我们专注于研究特殊外来微生物、矿物、气体和液体的内部结构和用途，包括变形怪、马卡斯、三尖树、BL9，但现在主要是BL9，因为BL9是其中最独特、最灵活、相对容易影响和改变其结构的。\n\n它的独特能力可能导致可怕的突变，也可能是某种治疗或保护免受其他微生物的伤害。
context:

original: Well, Arganoides are adventurers, explorers, mercenaries in general native to a swamp-like shrouded by purple fog of some sorts planet, they are proficient at tracking, searching for anything that they consider valuable, it is their greatest skill.\n \n    They are tall graceful humanoid beings, emitting bright purple crystalline light, it's head resembles a water shaped droplet with hair-like long tentacles growing out of it, it has elongated eyes as well
translation: 好吧，阿加诺维德人是冒险家，探险家，雇佣兵，通常生活在一个被紫色雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球上，他们擅长跟踪，寻找任何他们认为有价值的东西，这是他们最大的技能。\n\n它们是高大优雅的人形生物，发出明亮的紫色水晶光，它的头部像一个水状的水滴，头发一样长的触手从它长出来，它有细长的眼睛。

original: Well, Arganoides are native to a swamp-like shrouded by purple fog of some sorts planet, Wanzeltiums are native to a beatiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet, Davranides are native to a beautiful water planet, Saldeniums are native to a volcanic barren wasteland-like planet
translation: 阿尔加诺原产于一颗被紫色雾笼罩的沼泽般的星球，万泽尔提姆原产于一颗美丽茂密的丛林般的野生森林星球，达夫兰尼德斯是一个美丽的水星球的原住民，萨尔德尼亚原产于一个像火山一样贫瘠荒地的星球。

original: Well, Davranides are scientists, researchers, very professional keepers of scientific knowledge in general native to a beautiful water planet, researching microorganisms, splicing them, producing drugs, experimenting with mutagens, symbiotes, is something that they are very skilled at.\n \n    They are average height smooth-skinned amphibian-like humanoids, emitting a bright azure-blue crystalline light, having elongated cranium with eyes that protrude from each side of it's head on short stalks, they often have a calculating gaze as well
translation: 达夫拉尼德斯是科学家，研究人员，非常专业的科学知识保管者，通常居住在一个美丽的水星球上，研究微生物，剪接它们，生产药物，试验诱变剂，共生体，是他们非常擅长的事情。\n\n它们是一种平均身高、皮肤光滑的两栖类人形动物，发出明亮的蓝蓝色水晶光，头盖骨细长，眼睛从头部两侧伸出，长在短柄上，它们通常也有一种精打细算的凝视

original: Well, Saldeniums are incredibly strong warriors, hunters, mercenaries native to a volcanic barren wasteland-like planet, waging wars, conquering tribes, hunting animals and people in cases of mercenaries, teaching combat is something that they are very proficient at.\n \n    They are tall leathery-skinned fierce-looking humanoids, emitting a bright solar-orange crystalline light, it's forehead is ridged, it's entire face is covered with multiple curved spikes and it's neck has some sorts of breathing tubes, their gaze is akin to a hunter as well
translation: 萨尔德尼人是非常强大的战士、猎人、雇佣兵，他们出生在一个火山贫瘠的荒原上，像星球一样，发动战争，征服部落，猎杀动物和人，在雇佣兵的情况下，教授战斗是他们非常精通的事情。\n\n它们是高高的皮革皮肤，看起来凶猛的人形生物，发出明亮的太阳橙色水晶光，前额呈脊状，整个脸布满多个弯曲的刺，脖子上有一些呼吸管，它们的目光也类似于猎人

original: Well, Wanzeltiums are builders, engineers, craftsmen in general native to a beautiful and dense jungle-like wildforests planet, they are masters of creating magnificent structures, ingeniously made tech, sturdy and durable armor along with strong weapons, it is their greatest skill.\n \n    They are over 5'8 feet tall reptile-like humanoids, emitting a bright green crystalline light, with a reptilian-humanoid head having a greatly widened forehead covered with multiple thick skin lines, multiple hair-like spiky protrusions coming out of the back and sides of it's head, having wide eyes as well
translation: 嗯，万泽尔提乌斯是建筑商、工程师、工匠，通常居住在一个美丽而茂密的丛林般的荒野森林星球上，他们是创造宏伟建筑的大师，巧妙地制造技术，坚固耐用的盔甲以及强大的武器，这是他们最大的技能。\n\n它们身高超过5英尺8英寸，像爬虫类人形动物，发出明亮的绿色水晶光，像爬虫类人形动物的头部前额大大加宽，覆盖着多条厚厚的皮肤线，背部和头部两侧有多个毛发状的尖突，眼睛也很宽

original: Well, there are 8 biomes that we know about, however there are also lesser known cave biomes systems hidden under 'THEIR' fortification towers, all kinds of dangerous alien creatures inhabit each of them, mutated animal types, insectoids, weird mutated creatures.\n \n    Now, most dangerous ones are advanced aliens' mobile bases, we should not venture there until we are strong enough to handle 'Alliance', how they call themselves
translation: 嗯，我们知道有8个生物群落，但也有一些不太为人所知的洞穴生物群落系统隐藏在“他们的”防御塔下，各种危险的外来生物居住在每一个生物群落中，变异的动物类型，昆虫类，奇怪的变异生物。现在，最危险的是高级外星人的移动基地，我们不应该冒险去那里，除非我们有足够的实力去处理他们如何称呼自己的“联盟”
context:

original: Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL, long-time survivors, we are in need of your help. This map contains locations of 15 structures ranging from gigantic to huge, filled with all sorts of enemies, both human and alien, that either need to be entirely destroyed or captured with your help. All explanations about this you can find in intel or journals. If you want to help us, follow this order of locations.\n \n    Castle of Cult, then Anomalies in this order: Abandoned Lab, Cult Lair, Abandoned Factory, Cult Dungeon, then Military Island, then Biomes in this order: Hive Caves, Underground Ruins Caves, Acid Caves, Water Caves, Lava Caves, then Alien Dominators' Mobile Bases in this order: Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well
translation: 无论谁找到了这张地图——这是一个求救信号，长期幸存者，我们需要你们的帮助。这张地图包含15个建筑的位置，从巨大到巨大，充满了各种各样的敌人，包括人类和外星人，它们要么需要被完全摧毁，要么需要在你的帮助下被捕获。关于这一点的所有解释都可以在英特尔或期刊上找到。如果您想帮助我们，请按照以下位置顺序进行操作。\n \n邪教城堡，然后依次为：废弃实验室、邪教巢穴、废弃工厂、邪教地牢，然后是军事岛屿，然后依次为生物群落：蜂巢洞穴、地下遗址洞穴、酸性洞穴、水洞、熔岩洞穴，然后依次为外星人主宰者的移动基地：阿尔加诺、万泽尔提乌斯、达夫拉尼德斯，萨尔德尼乌斯

original: Hmm, stranger, there is this adventurer mate, always moving around, scattering some kind of intel, seeks for survivors that can help with some work that requires lots of combat skills. This mate told me about some secret benevolent type BL9 research organization, a GOOD kind of it, stranger, they want to restore civilization, help people survive, create medicine, build shelters, help people to procreate, they work discreetly yet they actually help with building, protecting communities of survivors
translation: 嗯，陌生人，有一个冒险家伙伴，总是四处走动，散布一些情报，寻找幸存者，帮助完成一些需要大量战斗技能的工作。这位朋友告诉我一些秘密的慈善型BL9研究组织，一个很好的组织，陌生人，他们想要恢复文明，帮助人们生存，创造药物，建造庇护所，帮助人们生育，他们谨慎地工作，但实际上他们帮助建筑，保护幸存者社区
context:

original: Hmm, stranger, you think it's fiction? You see, cultists, armed to teeth military, strange alien mutants, advanced alien militia, you think these communities of survivors survive by themselves? This benevolent organization does it's best to use BL9 as a universal material to craft medicine, armor, weapons for survivors to use. They also salvage, restore any advanced alien tech that can be valuable for them along with survivors. Stranger, I've even heard of 'Alliance' members turning to rebels siding with this organization as well
translation: 嗯，陌生人，你认为这是虚构的？你们看，邪教分子，全副武装的军队，奇怪的外星人突变体，先进的外星人民兵，你们认为这些幸存者群体靠自己生存吗？这个仁慈的组织尽最大努力使用BL9作为通用材料来制造药品、盔甲和武器，供幸存者使用。他们还打捞、恢复任何对他们和幸存者有价值的先进外星技术。奇怪的是，我甚至听说“联盟”成员也转向支持这个组织的叛军

To buy Tier 2 gear you need to have the Tier 1 variant of the same gear in your inventory as well
translation: 当然是金币和白金的组合！在你的PDA或笔记本或其他任何地方查看你的BL9食谱。你需要收集金币和白金，然后制作这些组合-每种黄金或白金组合需要100件相应类型-100黄金需要制作1个金币组合，100白金需要制作1个白金组合，陌生人！要购买Tier 2装备，您需要在库存中也有相同装备的Tier 1变体

original: A heavily armored mercenary infected by the BL9. It seems to have grown in size being over 7 feet tall.It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely very aggressive look on it's face, greater strength and endurance, bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence, they will do their best to stop any intruder that managed to infiltrate their compound, this one is armed with a huge sledgehammer and it obviously knows how to use it well.
translation: 一个被BL9感染的重装雇佣兵。它的体型似乎已经超过7英尺高。它似乎是有知觉的，具有正常人的所有特征，除了脸上奇怪的攻击性表情，更大的力量和耐力，充血的眼睛表明BL9的存在，他们会尽全力阻止任何入侵者设法渗透到他们的营地，它配备了一个巨大的大锤，它显然知道如何很好地使用它。

original: A zealot in long red robes wearing a strange skull mask infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence, their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a sword and it seems to know how to use it well.
translation: 一个身穿红色长袍的狂热者，戴着一个被BL9感染的奇怪的头盖骨面具。它似乎有知觉，拥有正常人的所有特征，除了奇怪的庄严凝视、死灰的苍白皮肤和充血的眼睛表明BL9的存在，他们的动机是杀死那些不接受他们的“迪奥”祝福的人，它手里拿着一把剑，似乎知道如何很好地使用它。

original: A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence, their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a crossbow and it seems to know how to use it well.
translation: 一个被BL9感染的狂热者。它似乎有知觉，拥有正常人的所有特征，除了奇怪的庄严凝视，死灰的皮肤和充血的眼睛表明BL9的存在，他们的动机是杀死那些不接受他们的“迪奥”祝福的人，这个人带着一把弩，似乎知道如何很好地使用它。

original: An armored mercenary infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely aggressive and bothered look on it's face, seemingly faster reflexes and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence, they will do their best to stop any intruder that managed to infiltrate their compound, this one is armed with a bayonet and it obviously knows how to use it well
translation: 被BL9感染的装甲雇佣兵。它看起来是有知觉的，除了脸上奇怪的攻击性和烦躁的表情，似乎更快的反应和充血的眼睛表明了BL9的存在，他们会尽最大努力阻止任何入侵者，它武装有一把刺刀，而且显然知道如何用好它。

original: Ah, so you've come across the Caustic Plant Caves? BL9 experiments as you can see led to creations of such grotesque but nevertheless beautiful creatures like `IT`. However, infusing humans and animals only with this peculiar organism is a true shame for someone who has been experimenting with plants as well, there are more things to experiment on! This is how Caustic Plant Caves were created - a truly dangerous environment where plant-like BL9 beings live on their own using the best of their 'hive mind' to breed and evolve...

original:
Aha, so he has some hopes to settle down with me, that's very sweet! That's beneficial for our own safety. All 4 of us should be thankful that we have even managed to survive, assemble our team again. With intel that we've learned about strange organizations' activities in New England, no doubt that bio-soldiers, mutants are again being produced by shady masterminds. The most prominent are Strange Cult, 'THEY', there are also rumors of a more discreet organization called 'True Superiors'. Considering how careful 'Alliance' is, sheer numbers of these bio-soldiers, all of this made aliens choose a safe option of allying with them.
 
    Still, they are much weaker than pre-Cataclysm private military organizations, they are simply remnants of former ones. However, they are way too sophisticated for mere remnants. I know some altruistic remnants of organizations, they are quite advanced, but are still forced into hiding. They even rely on help from local survivors. I'm not sure if we should concentrate on restoring safety in our local areas like professional survivors, or support my partner's obsession with further investigating these ourselves, I'm confused honestly.
 
    What I know from our allies is that survivors do fend off these bastards successfully, they even attack their structures. Even though my distrust towards these experiments is greatest compared to all of us, these scientists have shown me proof of saving survivors from dangers of The Blob, Mycus, Triffids. Clearly, BL9 is a symbiote, it's origin is not of regular bioweapons. Only because it is either easily modifiable BL9 or horrible mutations from The Blob from local water, BL9 has a potential to be safe option to protect everyone, but only provided that experiments are long-term, guarantee physical, mental safety of hosts hopefully as well
translation:

All 4 of us should be thankful that we have even managed to survive, assemble our team again. With intel that we've learned about strange organizations' activities in New England, no doubt that bio-soldiers, mutants are again being produced by shady masterminds. The most prominent are Strange Cult, 'THEY', there are also rumors of a more discreet organization called 'True Superiors'. Considering how careful 'Alliance' is, sheer numbers of these bio-soldiers, all of this made aliens choose a safe option of allying with them.

I know some altruistic remnants of organizations, they are quite advanced, but are still forced into hiding. They even rely on help from local survivors. I'm not sure if we should concentrate on restoring safety in our local areas like professional survivors, or support my partner's obsession with further investigating these ourselves, I'm confused honestly.
 
    What I know from our allies is that survivors do fend off these bastards successfully, they even attack their structures. Even though my distrust towards these experiments is greatest compared to all of us, these scientists have shown me proof of saving survivors from dangers of The Blob, Mycus, Triffids. original:
Alright, she let me write this first, because I suck at writing coherently, hah. Weird name for our journal, but I would not have even survived half of our encounters without her. Tough lady she is. Now to business. It was before Cataclysm. I thought we killed this bastard in his mansion, with us barely managing do this successfully. We were trying to acquire enough proof in order to close, as we later learned, his superiors' organization for good, standing behind incident in that mansion, but no.
 
    In the same year, horrible incident in That City. Small city, in the middle of nowhere, perfect place to conduct experiments. Hidden laboratory, unsanctioned bioweapons experiments going wrong, population turning into aggressive mutants, city being nuked from the face of Earth essentially. Many evacuated, not witnessing anything, luckily for them. However, some were caught in the middle of these events: former police officer man with my engineer sister with a little girl, also my partner.
 
    My partner, as a veteran military agent, was sent there to find essentially traces of whatever turned this many people into horrifying mutants or drugs that would counter this bioweapon. What she went through, what she found, what she saw in That City though was even more interesting. Diary of main scientist with proof of one of his samples being stolen from him by military men. Highly trained female infiltrator searching for something in laboratory. Giant fucktard mutated bioweapon that deliberately hunted down remaining survivors in That City, chased my partner, that she has managed to kill, luckily for us
translation:
Alright, she let me write this first, because I suck at writing coherently, hah. Weird name for our journal, but I would not have even survived half of our encounters without her. Tough lady she is. Now to business. It was before Cataclysm. I thought we killed this bastard in his mansion, with us barely managing do this successfully. We were trying to acquire enough proof in order to close, as we later learned, his superiors' organization for good, standing behind incident in that mansion, but no.
 
    In the same year, horrible incident in That City. Small city, in the middle of nowhere, perfect place to conduct experiments. Hidden laboratory, unsanctioned bioweapons experiments going wrong, population turning into aggressive mutants, city being nuked from the face of Earth essentially. Many evacuated, not witnessing anything, luckily for them. However, some were caught in the middle of these events: former police officer man with my engineer sister with a little girl, also my partner.
 
    My partner, as a veteran military agent, was sent there to find essentially traces of whatever turned this many people into horrifying mutants or drugs that would counter this bioweapon. What she went through, what she found, what she saw in That City though was even more interesting. Diary of main scientist with proof of one of his samples being stolen from him by military men. Highly trained female infiltrator searching for something in laboratory. Giant fucktard mutated bioweapon that deliberately hunted down remaining survivors in That City, chased my partner, that she has managed to kill, luckily for us

original:
Essentially in my work thinking in absolutes means either of two things. Either granting access to all of these drugs, genetically modified microorganisms, to general public. Giving them all for free. Not thinking that this can produce riots, forced acceleration of production. At the same time, similar inadequate total access can make available production of bioweapons for madmen. Both are extremists points of views that must be avoided. This is what gave me motivation when I was going through that ruined city. I trusted this man. He seemed like he was hating himself for his involvement in this mess. All he needed, he said, was to make sure that their property won't get into their hands. Incident in that mansion fooled me into trusting him.
 
    I've found very important intelligence in police station, records of a former member of investigation department that almost got investigators' team killed in that mansion. It was said that man was incredibly devious, cunning. It's as if his betrayal was planned in advance. Whoever wrote this had suspicions of involvement of this organization in an attempted murder of investigators' team. This made me think of who I actually work for. However, there was no real proof of whether it was the same person or not. In the same police station I've met a newly promoted corporal, pretty young, seemed to lack experience, still, confident in a non-arrogant way, determined to survive, also escape to safety with whatever companion of his that he mentioned.
 
    I saved his ass from one of hunters bioweapons sent to kill any witnesses. Hah, he was keep asking me questions. I tried to buzz him off saying that he should be glad that not only I didn't kill him, but also saved his ass multiple times as well. I didn't know that we would meet in Europe with him again. Well, I did steal a sample from him. Still, I knew by then who I worked for, sending him fake sample as a reward. What do I do now after Cataclysm? Well, I've recently brought an advanced BL9 sample to human disguised exiled alien scientist that helps humans survive
translation:
Essentially in my work thinking in absolutes means either of two things. Either granting access to all of these drugs, genetically modified microorganisms, to general public. Giving them all for free. Not thinking that this can produce riots, forced acceleration of production. At the same time, similar inadequate total access can make available production of bioweapons for madmen. Both are extremists points of views that must be avoided. This is what gave me motivation when I was going through that ruined city. I trusted this man. He seemed like he was hating himself for his involvement in this mess. All he needed, he said, was to make sure that their property won't get into their hands. Incident in that mansion fooled me into trusting him.
 
    I've found very important intelligence in police station, records of a former member of investigation department that almost got investigators' team killed in that mansion. It was said that man was incredibly devious, cunning. It's as if his betrayal was planned in advance. Whoever wrote this had suspicions of involvement of this organization in an attempted murder of investigators' team. This made me think of who I actually work for. However, there was no real proof of whether it was the same person or not. In the same police station I've met a newly promoted corporal, pretty young, seemed to lack experience, still, confident in a non-arrogant way, determined to survive, also escape to safety with whatever companion of his that he mentioned.
 
    I saved his ass from one of hunters bioweapons sent to kill any witnesses. Hah, he was keep asking me questions. I tried to buzz him off saying that he should be glad that not only I didn't kill him, but also saved his ass multiple times as well. I didn't know that we would meet in Europe with him again. Well, I did steal a sample from him. Still, I knew by then who I worked for, sending him fake sample as a reward. What do I do now after Cataclysm? Well, I've recently brought an advanced BL9 sample to human disguised exiled alien scientist that helps humans survive

original:
Hmm, let's continue this. What a name for a journal, I like this soft side of his, hah. This man is essentially definition of reliability, formidability. Where do I continue? Aha, yes, That City events. Was I surprised that there was conspiracy involved? Not really. That scum we thought we had killed in that mansion was cunning, devious, just like that woman who changed God knows how many employers. Organization's founder, that was behind events of that mansion along with That City, was no less of a mad man. The more ambitious they were, the more fucked up their ideas were. Some wanted regional power, some wanted riches, some wanted World domination, whereas some were so fucked up in terms of their ideas that I'm glad we've killed them.
 
   Him and his superiors had a simple plan. First, retrieve whatever of their horrible work they left there, then leave no witnesses thanks to their bio-soldiers hunters, then let government do their job of nuking city so that nobody would know of this. These bastards' arrogance, huh? No way, motherfuckers. Not only me with some good people have escaped safely, we have also managed to destroy a lot of these bio-soldiers with all of these hunters. I've acquired plenty of intel to learn that fucker from that mansion was alive, plotting to continue work of his superiors. He later killed them, betrayed everyone he knew.
 
    I can tell you more, there were bioweapons with all kinds of private mutants armies in many parts of the World essentially. Private military organizations, rich, power craving people, cultists, all sorts of madmen. All tied to someone bigger than them. Then Cataclysm happened. Still, me, my partner with other agents have luckily managed to assemble our team again

original: Honestly, it's nowhere to be found when they've created their civilizations. Still, presence of hostile fauna, pretty harsh environmental conditions, all of this kind of makes an assumption that this would have hindered their progress sufficiently. What gave them so much strength is that they've found a unique source of energy on each of their planets.\n \n    In main journal we have already explained how they've used it to evolve from savages. However, it also boosts their physical capabilities. Crystalline glow that they have is due to their high consumption of this energy. They have become addicted to it, even with all advancements of theirs, they run out of this energy supply. They seek BL9 for this reason as well

original: Humanoid brute amalgamation of all feral aliens, that were brought to Earth essentially by 'Alliance' for them to experiment on. Inhravtidius carapace on it's torso along with a pincer in the place of it's left arm. Yengnutrium wings, protruding from it's back along with a razor sharp serrated claw in the place of it's right arm. Ulniviunite slime on it's torso along with a lamprey-type mouth from which a long, whip-like spiked tongue is stretching. Ezrondium arachnid legs, incredibly sharp, piercing floor as it moves. Tentacles, emerging from various parts of it's body essentially. Unlike other beasts, this one is in particular rage, as if it was made for hunting. It is bigger, faster compared to other beasts, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's tentacles
