original:
I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed before Cataclysm. I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones. However, our own leader betrayed us, selling us to 'THEM', hoping to be one of 'THEIR' allies in New World that 'THEY' want to build.
 
    'THEY' have killed, abducted many of our people, but many of us have also managed to escape. We've made secret BL9 research, safety bases thanks to Ulysses along with many of our scientists who believe that we can modify it to be safe, beneficial even to use for equipment or even drugs. I try to do my best to strive if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence along with survival of our organization, my people...
translation:
I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed before Cataclysm. I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones. However, our own leader betrayed us, selling us to 'THEM', hoping to be one of 'THEIR' allies in New World that 'THEY' want to build.
 
    'THEY' have killed, abducted many of our people, but many of us have also managed to escape. We've made secret BL9 research, safety bases thanks to Ulysses along with many of our scientists who believe that we can modify it to be safe, beneficial even to use for equipment or even drugs. I try to do my best to strive if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence along with survival of our organization, my people...

original: I honestly try to not hide valuable info from my colleagues, but only 3 people: Subject5, Ulysses, I know about this. Just can't trust everyone, I'm essentially an exile to my own race, yet also one of the alien invaders to humans. Wanzeltiums with me have developed a unique technology: Energy Shield Generators that create a gigantic energy field based on sources that we've found on our planets. This field can protect people from horrors of Cataclysm, keeping even 'Alliance' militia away, shields are this strong.\n \n    Luckily, I've contributed greatly to making blueprints, with me being responsible for most of this technology, they won't be able to replicate it any time soon. Still, version that I have built has been definitely brought to their main base here but they have no idea how to make it work. Not even mentioning need to salvage more of their tech to get more power cells to make multiple Shield Generators. If Ulysses' child, Subject5, is clever enough with putting intel or journals, armed survivors may help us to cleanse all of these locations so that Shield Generator can be safely retrieved. We lack military, we're trying to repel 'THEIR' attacks as much as we can, we clearly need help from survivors as well
translation: I honestly try to not hide valuable info from my colleagues, but only 3 people: Subject5, Ulysses, I know about this. Just can't trust everyone, I'm essentially an exile to my own race, yet also one of the alien invaders to humans. Wanzeltiums with me have developed a unique technology: Energy Shield Generators that create a gigantic energy field based on sources that we've found on our planets. This field can protect people from horrors of Cataclysm, keeping even 'Alliance' militia away, shields are this strong.\n \n    Luckily, I've contributed greatly to making blueprints, with me being responsible for most of this technology, they won't be able to replicate it any time soon. Still, version that I have built has been definitely brought to their main base here but they have no idea how to make it work. Not even mentioning need to salvage more of their tech to get more power cells to make multiple Shield Generators. If Ulysses' child, Subject5, is clever enough with putting intel or journals, armed survivors may help us to cleanse all of these locations so that Shield Generator can be safely retrieved. We lack military, we're trying to repel 'THEIR' attacks as much as we can, we clearly need help from survivors as well

original: I've grown in one of our organization's core centers.Mymy father is a bright very experienced symbiotes scientist, yet he's a very kind, humane person, he wants me to be a scientist. My mother is a former scientist who mutated into a very graceful plant humanoid, retaining most of her humanity. She abandoned us, because she feared of what our own people could do to our family for having a mutant as a member of our organization. Years after, I've essentially grown indifferent to my father's work.\n \n    'THEY' attacked our core center, our own leader betrayed all of us. Hundreds of our people killed, kidnapped, abducted. Hundreds of mutated soldiers, vile creatures with inhumane strength and agility. Some of us escaped, like my father with some scientists, workers and our main agent. I didn't follow them. I ran to labs, I've injected myself with one of experimental symbiotes, BL9, my father has been working on it for years. Managed to use my new abilities to escape safely, alone. I search for remnants of our organization, I know they exist, I know they along with my father have survived. With this intel, journals, survivors could help me, our organization to fight our enemies successfully hopefully as well

She abandoned us, because she feared of what our own people could do to our family for having a mutant as a member of our organization. Hundreds of mutated soldiers, vile creatures with inhumane strength and agility. Some of us escaped, like my father with some scientists, workers and our main agent. I didn't follow them. With this intel, journals, survivors could help me, our organization to fight our enemies successfully hopefully as well

original: I've grown without father, like majority of Davranides families. We breed or 'fuck', they feed us a drug that cleanses love, affection hormones, amplifying pleasure hormones. Simply no love or affection allowed, it confuses minds they say. A bright child, I've got education in a prestigious university, worked in one of our top symbiotes research centers. I've learned a lot from our female mentor, she has shown me her personal projects, hidden from authorities, beneficial drugs, not just symbiote weapons. One of them restores all of our hormones to normal levels. We've developed forbidden affection, love, got lost in it but we were happy.\n \n    One of our authorities suspects 'unsanctioned experiments', frames my mentor, she gets killed, my own people destroy all of trust I had for them. Years after, I'm an experienced scientist. This fucktard confronts me, tells me I should be grateful he didn't frame me. I tell him all I think about him. We fight, he forcefully injects me with an experimental symbiote. I brutally smash fuckard into a pulp with my tentacle hammers. I escape via 'Alliance' portal to Earth, then I disguise as a human, I try to help a friendly organization to rebuild. Search for love, tell 'fuck off' to everyone else who prevents you from doing so. Find him or her. Be happy. I still search for my love with hope as well
translation: I've grown without father, like majority of Davranides families. We breed or 'fuck', they feed us a drug that cleanses love, affection hormones, amplifying pleasure hormones. Simply no love or affection allowed, it confuses minds they say. A bright child, I've got education in a prestigious university, worked in one of our top symbiotes research centers. I've learned a lot from our female mentor, she has shown me her personal projects, hidden from authorities, beneficial drugs, not just symbiote weapons. One of them restores all of our hormones to normal levels. We've developed forbidden affection, love, got lost in it but we were happy.\n \n    One of our authorities suspects 'unsanctioned experiments', frames my mentor, she gets killed, my own people destroy all of trust I had for them. Years after, I'm an experienced scientist. This fucktard confronts me, tells me I should be grateful he didn't frame me. I tell him all I think about him. We fight, he forcefully injects me with an experimental symbiote. I brutally smash fuckard into a pulp with my tentacle hammers. I escape via 'Alliance' portal to Earth, then I disguise as a human, I try to help a friendly organization to rebuild. Search for love, tell 'fuck off' to everyone else who prevents you from doing so. Find him or her. Be happy. I still search for my love with hope as well

original:
If you are not in any of BL9 Safety Bases, you need to find at least one of them, this is important. If you are in any of BL9 Safety Bases currently, you need to talk to Base Android for her to answer your questions via her built-in system which stores categorized various optional intel along with journals which she can read which we have collected. They are optional to read honestly, but I suggest you to read them if you care more than just about loot from structures of our enemies in general. In order to explore BL9 locations safely, YOU NEED TO ASK BASE ANDROID ABOUT ORDER OF EXPLORATION when talking to her, this is important.
 
    BL9 recipes for BL9 weapons ammo, for BL9 melee weapons unlock upon reaching level 3 in fabrication along with mechanics, advanced recipes unlock upon reaching level 6 in fabrication along with mechanics. First two tiers of regular weapons, modifiers, armor are sold by BL9 Strange Merchant. He sells them for Gold, Platinum Coins Combinations, which can be crafted via BL9 recipes from normal Gold, Platinum Coins which you can find when completing missions. Gold, Platinum Coins drop in huge amounts from monsters in Castlelan Castle, Militarized Island, this is important. Smaller structures which includes Infested Facility along with Biomes like Guard Towers with Caves Systems Beneath them along with Mobile 'Alliance' Base contain sci-fi ranged weapons, sci-fi melee weapons with unique effects to use against enemies, they also contain armor, artifacts, permanent versions of modifiers essentially. To acquire sci-fi items, artifacts, buildings, caves need to be fully explored.
 
    If we want to 'unfuck', save us, give us a guarantee to survive, live, love, procreate, you need to find Shield Generator which I have devised. This valuable machine is located in Mobile 'Alliance' Base. Bring it to BL9 Safety Base Android system which upon your orders according to how I have programmed it will activate Shield Generator to generate a Protective Shield hopefully. May God keep you, keep all of us safe, bring you, bring all of us luck hopefully as well

original: Initiate Radio Call. You can hear me? I am the creator of this Shield Generator that you have helped us to activate! You have managed to do this! Also, these structures that belong to 'Alliance', some of which you have cleared, have a lot of remaining tech for our scavengers teams to salvage. This means that not only your BL9 Safety Base is a beacon of hope for life now, but also our own structures! We can actually restore civilization, restore humanity now! Power cells in these generators will work for a very long time, decades, if not for a century essentially. Not even mentioning remaining tech that 'Alliance' has, which is essentially an endless supply of power cells for us! This BL9 Safety Base now belongs to you, survivor of hope in life, you can live, love, try to procreate, build a family in your own really safe shelter! This is what we will also try to do! May God keep you, keep all of us healthy, safe, bring you, bring all of us luck hopefully as well

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. Aha, so he has some hopes to settle down with me, that's very sweet! That's beneficial for our own safety. All 4 of us should be thankful that we have even managed to survive, assemble our team again. With intel that we've learned about strange organizations' activities in New England, no doubt that bio-soldiers, mutants are again being produced by shady masterminds. The most prominent are Strange Cult, 'THEY', there are also rumors of a more discreet organization called 'True Superiors'. Considering how careful 'Alliance' is, sheer numbers of these bio-soldiers, all of this made aliens choose a safe option of allying with them.
 
    Still, they are much weaker than pre-Cataclysm private military organizations, they are simply remnants of former ones. However, they are way too sophisticated for mere remnants. I know some altruistic remnants of organizations, they are quite advanced, but are still forced into hiding. They even rely on help from local survivors. I'm not sure if we should concentrate on restoring safety in our local areas like professional survivors, or support my partner's obsession with further investigating these ourselves, I'm confused honestly.
 
    What I know from our allies is that survivors do fend off these bastards successfully, they even attack their structures. Even though my distrust towards these experiments is greatest compared to all of us, these scientists have shown me proof of saving survivors from dangers of The Blob, Mycus, Triffids. Clearly, BL9 is a symbiote, it's origin is not of regular bioweapons. Only because it is either easily modifiable BL9 or horrible mutations from The Blob from local water, BL9 has a potential to be safe option to protect everyone, but only provided that experiments are long-term, guarantee physical, mental safety of hosts hopefully as well

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. Alright, she let me write this first, because I suck at writing coherently, hah. Weird name for our journal, but I would not have even survived half of our encounters without her. Tough lady she is. Now to business. It was before Cataclysm. I thought we killed this bastard in his mansion, with us barely managing do this successfully. We were trying to acquire enough proof in order to close, as we later learned, his superiors' organization for good, standing behind incident in that mansion, but no.
 
    In the same year, horrible incident in That City. Small city, in the middle of nowhere, perfect place to conduct experiments. Hidden laboratory, unsanctioned bioweapons experiments going wrong, population turning into aggressive mutants, city being nuked from the face of Earth essentially. Many evacuated, not witnessing anything, luckily for them. However, some were caught in the middle of these events: former police officer man with my engineer sister with a little girl, also my partner.
 
    My partner, as a veteran military agent, was sent there to find essentially traces of whatever turned this many people into horrifying mutants or drugs that would counter this bioweapon. What she went through, what she found, what she saw in That City though was even more interesting. Diary of main scientist with proof of one of his samples being stolen from him by military men. Highly trained female infiltrator searching for something in laboratory. Giant fucktard mutated bioweapon that deliberately hunted down remaining survivors in That City, chased my partner, that she has managed to kill, luckily for us

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. Essentially in my work thinking in absolutes means either of two things. Either granting access to all of these drugs, genetically modified microorganisms, to general public. Giving them all for free. Not thinking that this can produce riots, forced acceleration of production. At the same time, similar inadequate total access can make available production of bioweapons for madmen. Both are extremists points of views that must be avoided. This is what gave me motivation when I was going through that ruined city. I trusted this man. He seemed like he was hating himself for his involvement in this mess. All he needed, he said, was to make sure that their property won't get into their hands. Incident in that mansion fooled me into trusting him.
 
    I've found very important intelligence in police station, records of a former member of investigation department that almost got investigators' team killed in that mansion. It was said that man was incredibly devious, cunning. It's as if his betrayal was planned in advance. Whoever wrote this had suspicions of involvement of this organization in an attempted murder of investigators' team. This made me think of who I actually work for. However, there was no real proof of whether it was the same person or not. In the same police station I've met a newly promoted corporal, pretty young, seemed to lack experience, still, confident in a non-arrogant way, determined to survive, also escape to safety with whatever companion of his that he mentioned.
 
    I saved his ass from one of hunters bioweapons sent to kill any witnesses. Hah, he was keep asking me questions. I tried to buzz him off saying that he should be glad that not only I didn't kill him, but also saved his ass multiple times as well. I didn't know that we would meet in Europe with him again. Well, I did steal a sample from him. Still, I knew by then who I worked for, sending him fake sample as a reward. What do I do now after Cataclysm? Well, I've recently brought an advanced BL9 sample to human disguised exiled alien scientist that helps humans survive

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. Hmm, let's continue this. What a name for a journal, I like this soft side of his, hah. This man is essentially definition of reliability, formidability. Where do I continue? Aha, yes, That City events. Was I surprised that there was conspiracy involved? Not really. That scum we thought we had killed in that mansion was cunning, devious, just like that woman who changed God knows how many employers. Organization's founder, that was behind events of that mansion along with That City, was no less of a mad man. The more ambitious they were, the more fucked up their ideas were. Some wanted regional power, some wanted riches, some wanted World domination, whereas some were so fucked up in terms of their ideas that I'm glad we've killed them.
 
   Him and his superiors had a simple plan. First, retrieve whatever of their horrible work they left there, then leave no witnesses thanks to their bio-soldiers hunters, then let government do their job of nuking city so that nobody would know of this. These bastards' arrogance, huh? No way, motherfuckers. Not only me with some good people have escaped safely, we have also managed to destroy a lot of these bio-soldiers with all of these hunters. I've acquired plenty of intel to learn that fucker from that mansion was alive, plotting to continue work of his superiors. He later killed them, betrayed everyone he knew.
 
    I can tell you more, there were bioweapons with all kinds of private mutants armies in many parts of the World essentially. Private military organizations, rich, power craving people, cultists, all sorts of madmen. All tied to someone bigger than them. Then Cataclysm happened. Still, me, my partner with other agents have luckily managed to assemble our team again

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. I am an agent working on one of the remnants of many secret organizations that existed before Cataclysm. I was born in one of it's main hidden facilities, my father was a retired military officer who was hired as a mercenary and worked long for this organization.
 
    Obviously, such organizations had and many still have many hidden facilities, vaults, many different structures, an unbelievable amount of resources to feed and supply multiple generations' of survivors and it's agents' offspring.
 
    For many years I've been training diligently to become not just a survivor and a scavenger - but an agent who can search and scavenge for rare resources as well along with the basic ones. However, our own leader betrayed us, selling us to 'THEM', hoping to be one of 'THEIR' allies in New World that 'THEY' want to build.
 
    'THEY' have killed, abducted many of our people, but many of us have also managed to escape. We've made secret BL9 research, safety bases thanks to Ulysses along with many of our scientists who believe that we can modify it to be safe, beneficial even to use for equipment or even drugs. I try to do my best to strive if not for flourishment but at the very least continued existence along with survival of our organization, my people...
translation:

Clearly, Cataclysm happened, however, our training, our experience, our stubbornness really saved our asses. Each of involved agents had a safety plan, in case of global threat that would significantly damage or mostly destroy communications systems. Special safezones located across the entire World for agents from various countries. Back then, 4 of us were stationed in North America.    My partner wants us to stay here, to help local survivor structures with more mundane stuff that requires more concentration. Maybe not. No, not now. Cults, 'THEY', 'True Superiors', this fucker is still out there. Unless we get help from survivors. Maybe we have a chance to settle down, survive, live together hopefully as well

Initiate fancy reading mode. Inventions of 20th century - can you imagine how impactful they were? Some have improved our lifestyle, others have advanced all of us as a civilization. But humans still remained filthy humans with their animal needs, failing to see the bigger picture of what humans are truly capable of.     Even though our organization made a lot of progress, that was not without curious feeble beings, limited by ethics, shoving their noses into what was beyond their comprehension. Plan was simple, lure them into a trap in one of our mansions they intended to investigate. That plan failed, though, it was not mine in first place. That failed, fuckers proved to be too stubborn, however, experience is what I've gained from this.
 
    This failure brought a lot of unwanted attention to our organization. It needed to be restructured. So it was. My temporary friend, main scientist in our lab of That City, was given an order to accelerate development of new bioweapon. However, his views started to change. There were disagreements with his superiors. His own pride and foolishness gave me an advantage. Seeing my high intelligence, knowledge that I've gained from this 'friend' of mine, I've managed to convince my benefactor to forcefully acquire samples of newest bioweapon that my 'friend' has made in That City

Initiate fancy reading mode. My dear describes my motives pretty clearly. We've survived a horrifying incident in That City full of shady bastards behind it essentially. We've travelled across the World, fought madmen along with their creations. My dear warned me though that eventually we can uncover things that will make government treat us differently. I convinced him though that our usefulness simply matters much more to them than our knowledge, as long as we have no objections to working for them. Then Cataclysm happened. Governments were gone. No united control. Only individual organizations remained. Some new, some remnants of former organizations. All have different motives.
 
    Even though there is a lot of work we have in terms of rebuilding everything, I've convinced my dear for us to become hunters of some sorts. We investigate activities of strange local cults, military formations. If we suspect them to have not particularly friendly motives, we carefully check their structures. Usually they clearly are hostile, attack everyone on sight, however some really are altruistic. Latter are much more discreet, not because it is their intention. They achieve their goals only by communicating with, helping people. They are forced into hiding, especially in New England area because of Strange Cults, 'THEM', 'True Superiors', 'Alliance'. Should not we help them to fend them off to keep everyone safe?
 
    They all diligently hunt for BL9, all of these bastards. Even altruistic organizations that we've contacted convince us of BL9 not being a bioweapon, huh? I mean, pretty much everything around, The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, can be considered bioweapons, pretty much not safe for majority of people. I don't know, my brother would not agree, but if there are no alternative options. This potentially can be used as means to protect all of us, our offspring, hopefully as well

Initiate fancy reading mode. My father taught me one very important thing when I was a young girl. He told me that it is wrong to think in absolutes. Has he done something significant in his life with this way of thinking? Maybe. Maybe not. What I know is that his advice greatly helps me in my work. My work is not just means of acquiring money. It helps me to prevent people who think in absolutes from shaping the World in a way that they like. This is especially important if we are talking about genetical experiments related to unknown microorganisms which have many uses. From healthy drugs, protection, extending lives of people to bioweapons. Don't ask me how I got in this field of work. Let's just say that I have received plenty of military experience to work as a professional mercenary spy.
 
    I've heard of reputation of organization behind incidents in that mansion along with That City. No doubt that extremists were among it's leaders, intending to work on advanced bioweapons research. I was offered a job by an unknown man, who described himself as a former research scientist in that organization, who had changed his ways. My job was to intercept military, sent by that organization to kill their main scientist, stationed in That City's laboratory. My goal was not to save that scientist. Like I was told, scum simply wanted to sell property of their organization to highest bidder essentially. My task was to steal this property from military then bring it to my employer.
 
    As a careful person I am, I waited for a perfect opportunity to ambush them. However, my stealth approach was interrupted by hordes of mutants, attacking both me along with military. The whole city went to shit within a few minutes. I had to run for my life essentially. However, I am no dumb girl. I knew that lab must have contained various intelligence, notes, diaries, maybe even something more important. This scientist devoted himself to his work entirely. There must have been another sample in that laboratory. I managed to find both, though, it was very difficult to do based on what I've seen there honestly

The whole city went to shit within a few minutes. I had to run for my life essentially. However, I am no dumb girl. I knew that lab must have contained various intelligence, notes, diaries, maybe even something more important. This scientist devoted himself to his work entirely. There must have been another sample in that laboratory. I managed to find both, though, it was very difficult to do based on what I've seen there honestly

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. Name sounds like a cheap romance novel, but let's keep it like this for fun, as long as it makes both of us chuckle. How we've met? Ah, shit, reminds me of so much we've went through with her. Two desperate survivors in these horrible conditions stuck in a city full of terrors. Love was least of my priorities back then. I worked as a police officer in my home town. As I remember, this started with me receiving my promotion of a corporal under the condition that I would move to a nearby town. I needed money, so I agreed. It was That City, one of the most horrible pre-Cataclysm cases of unsanctioned bioweapons experiments.
 
    I was about to start my first day as a newly promoted corporal. I was being late when I've heard the sirens all across the city, evacuation helicopters recklessly getting away. On my way to police station I saw people aggressively chasing other people, leaping at them, grabbing them by their legs. They clawed them savagely then started to eat their flesh. It was horrifying and disgusting, I puked upon seeing this right in my car. Some of them saw me and ran towards my car, I pressed gas, running few of them over. I made my way to one of the closest relatively big markets.
 
    I went to this market get supplies, also to possibly find a good melee weapon, a fire axe or a wrench. I heard a running noise from the outside towards the same door I entered. A girl armed with a revolver clumsily yet quickly entered with a shambler behind her. I aimed at it, telling her to get down. With a headshot I killed it. Then we both ran towards my car, quickly made our way out of there. She was a junior robotics engineering student in That City. Her brother was a high-ranking veteran policeman. This explained to me her being pretty good with guns

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. One of our top scientists, the one who taught me everything I knew back then about microorganisms research, became a liability, to my own advantage. Old fool didn't know that I was already working on my own organization. I sent a professional female spy to ambush our men and steal samples of that bioweapon. Fucking snake in red dress failed though. Luckily, she found more samples in that laboratory in addition to valuable intelligence from my former 'friend' that even that old fool didn't get his hands on. That City incident was a good reason for me to leave our organization under the pretext of being worried of further investigations. I had plenty of data to research until discovery in Europe.
 
    Villagers, Cultists, Military, all turned into obedient mutants. This was somewhere in Europe. Controlled by some ambitious fucker. His research was really of high quality though, but not as good as what I've made with a later discovery. Didn't gain much from this except for being more careful with choosing people to work for me. That fucking snake in red dress fooled me, sent me a fake sample instead of a real one, never trust devious fuckers. I had temporary success with my latest discovery back then. It was perfect for global evolution according to my own views. I was enhanced like never before. I came as a guest to my former benefactor. I showed him everything that I've become, something that he could never possibly achieve, then I killed him.
 
    Fuckers from that mansion ruined everything. My newest invention was entirely destroyed with me being forced into hiding. Until Cataclysm happened. The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, so much to research! However, none of them are even as near as sophisticated as alien symbiote, BL9, which is hunted even by alien pillagers from other galaxies. I have created 'True Superiors' organization, I have built 'THEIR' army, I have fooled 'Alliance', forcing them to work with my organization. These feeble altruistic fuckers think they can stop our evolution with a bunch of survivors?

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. She is right, my honey really managed to rescue that scientist's daughter. Strange child, immune to That City's bioweapons, as she stated herself. That's what her father told her when injecting her with all kinds of shit. Her bruises were healing up at an extreme rate. The whole shit was really a conspiracy with shady people involved. This is what government told me later on. Hunter brute, horribly mutated scientist, stolen samples of bioweapons, shady female spy. That spy really did save my life multiple times, helping me to destroy this brute, but she clearly had her own motives there. Every time our paths crossed, I always knew that she had some errands to do, provided by her new employers. Whatever, we made it safe, now about events after That City essentially.
 
    Let's just say that government has become interested in two barely trained survivors going through so much shit successfully. We've been 'offered' government agents jobs. Not much choice, considering what we've seen. Then these were times of my duty in various parts of the World. Strangely, current New England prominent factions of madmen that are obsessed with BL9 symbiote really remind me of what I've seen in Europe. Is that some kind of a bullshit trend? As years went by, I tried to convince my engineer girl to let me talk government out of her further involvement. I've been seeing more and more shit that I didn't get killed for only because I'm too useful to kill essentially.
 
    Honey is too stubborn, she wanted to delve even deeper into this. Saving people from madmen with bioweapons is more important than building complex electromechanical systems. That's what she says. When Cataclysm happened, this tight grip was gone. So now we hunt for remnants of these madmen, whereas her brother with his partner try to rebuild everything in local areas. It's a fucking mess, but at least we've got each other to survive hopefully as well

original:
Initiate fancy reading mode. This really is a cheap romance novel name! Though, I actually find it funny. I was getting a robotics engineering degree in my university. I always found applied math, physics pretty fun. My brother, the cop in our family, approved of my decision, he is all fists and fighting, so analytical one in our family is a must. As my dear says about his first day of corporal rank experience, I felt the same way back then. Love, no. Safety, protection, yes. That's how I felt back then. My brother was missing, I was alone on the streets, searching for him, when the whole city went to shit. I ran as fast as I could to nearest building, coming across him. A guy in a police uniform, aiming his gun at me, telling me to get down. So I did, out of fear, yet he killed a shambler behind me.
 
    We made our way in his car to police station, which, disappointingly, was also infested with these mutants. Most were shamblers, but there was this horrible type. A fleshy beast with a grotesque head, long tongue, no eyes, and long claws size of a human. We were chased by a giant brute in this building. As we were hiding from it, I found documents proving that my brother left That City weeks ago to do his private investigation. Also we found a secret underground passage in That City's police station. It was leading to some kind of a laboratory complex, which answered most of our questions in terms of what the heck even happened in That City.
 
    This entire lab was a huge conspiracy. Unsanctioned bioweapons experiments. An incident with bioweapon leak was a result of lab's main mutated scientist going mad over his secret creation being stolen by some private military. On our way out of lab, we saved this scientist's daughter. Three of us barely made it out of there safely via an underground train system with that scientist beast and a huge brute chasing us

As my dear says about his first day of corporal rank experience, I felt the same way back then. Love, no. Safety, protection, yes. That's how I felt back then. My brother was missing, I was alone on the streets, searching for him, when the whole city went to shit. I ran as fast as I could to nearest building, coming across him. A guy in a police uniform, aiming his gun at me, telling me to get down. So I did, out of fear, yet he killed a shambler behind me.
 
    We made our way in his car to police station, which, disappointingly, was also infested with these mutants. Most were shamblers, but there was this horrible type. A fleshy beast with a grotesque head, long tongue, no eyes, and long claws size of a human. We were chased by a giant brute in this building. As we were hiding from it, I found documents proving that my brother left That City weeks ago to do his private investigation. Also we found a secret underground passage in That City's police station. It was leading to some kind of a laboratory complex, which answered most of our questions in terms of what the heck even happened in That City.
 
    This entire lab was a huge conspiracy. Unsanctioned bioweapons experiments. An incident with bioweapon leak was a result of lab's main mutated scientist going mad over his secret creation being stolen by some private military. On our way out of lab, we saved this scientist's daughter. Three of us barely made it out of there safely via an underground train system with that scientist beast and a huge brute chasing us

original:
Interesting, let's talk about our newly assembled team of former military agents. Clearly, Cataclysm happened, however, our training, our experience, our stubbornness really saved our asses. Each of involved agents had a safety plan, in case of global threat that would significantly damage or mostly destroy communications systems. Special safezones located across the entire World for agents from various countries. Back then, 4 of us were stationed in North America. This includes me, my partner, also my sister along with her police officer survivor, hah. They became a couple, their first 'survivors date' taught them how to care for each other real good.
 
   My partner wants us to stay here, to help local survivor structures with more mundane stuff that requires more concentration. Clearing local areas, handling logistics, making safe routes, expanding survivors' structures, helping find safe sources of water. Forget about secret vile organizations, eh? That's what younger professionals are for, right? My sister with her police officer promoted to a government agent, so, leave this shit for them to investigate?
 
    Maybe she is right, we need to care for each other, settle down together, help local survivors, ensure our own safety hopefully. We should also convince our couple of adventurers to do the same. Maybe not. No, not now. Cults, 'THEY', 'True Superiors', this fucker is still out there. Unless we get help from survivors. Maybe we have a chance to settle down, survive, live together hopefully as well

Clearing local areas, handling logistics, making safe routes, expanding survivors' structures, helping find safe sources of water. Forget about secret vile organizations, eh? That's what younger professionals are for, right? My sister with her police officer promoted to a government agent, so, leave this shit for them to investigate?
 
    Maybe she is right, we need to care for each other, settle down together, help local survivors, ensure our own safety hopefully. We should also convince our couple of adventurers to do the same. Maybe not. No, not now. Cults, 'THEY', 'True Superiors', this fucker is still out there. Unless we get help from survivors. Maybe we have a chance to settle down, survive, live together hopefully as well

original:
Inventions of 20th century - can you imagine how impactful they were? Some have improved our lifestyle, others have advanced all of us as a civilization. But humans still remained filthy humans with their animal needs, failing to see the bigger picture of what humans are truly capable of. However, one particular discovery, that later led to an invention, gave some a chance to evolve from this filthy state of animals. I was one of such who was worthy of this evolution. I started to see the bigger picture. I obediently followed my benefactors, learned from them, made temporary friends, who proved to be incredibly useful in terms of knowledge they shared in field of bioweapons research.
 
    Even though our organization made a lot of progress, that was not without curious feeble beings, limited by ethics, shoving their noses into what was beyond their comprehension. Not being a public figure in our organization, I was sent as a double agent to police department that was responsible for investigations related to one of our properties. Plan was simple, lure them into a trap in one of our mansions they intended to investigate. That plan failed, though, it was not mine in first place. When our weaker subjects failed to kill these two fuckers, I've decided to take on them myself, obviously, with help of one of our sophisticated creations. That failed, fuckers proved to be too stubborn, however, experience is what I've gained from this.
 
    This failure brought a lot of unwanted attention to our organization. It needed to be restructured. So it was. My temporary friend, main scientist in our lab of That City, was given an order to accelerate development of new bioweapon. However, his views started to change. There were disagreements with his superiors. His own pride and foolishness gave me an advantage. Seeing my high intelligence, knowledge that I've gained from this 'friend' of mine, I've managed to convince my benefactor to forcefully acquire samples of newest bioweapon that my 'friend' has made in That City

original: It's a sentient, very intelligent alien symbiote that has managed to appear on Earth via space warp gate, portals on Earth, fallen meteorites as well. It's only way of survival is via finding a host, causing a symbiosis. Symbiosis, depending on many factors, can vary. To list them, these can be BL9's attitude towards it's hosts, type of BL9 it is, whether BL9's structure was artificially changed somehow.\n \n    Symbiosis can be benign and even protective, granting it's host inhumane powers, protection. It can also lead to all kinds of incredible mutations that can turn hosts feral, mad yet obedient at the same time pretty much. Latter is something that 'THEY' often utilize to create an army of mindless obedient mutants as well

original: It's an alliance of alien invaders. These are 3 of them, Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides alien civilizations. There was one more, Saldeniums alien civilization, but they were too bloodthirsty to build mutually beneficial relations with someone so they were disposed of thanks to combined effort of other alien invaders alliance members which are definitely much more civilized. Their main reason of allying is supporting each other for successful survival on ravaged Earth, considering presence of all these hostile creatures here. Most important thing to them is BL9, they are obsessed with it, they seek it diligently.\n \n    They've learned, thanks to Davranides' research, that alien symbiotes are capable of granting their hosts incredible abilities. They've learned that BL9 is incredibly advanced, capable of being greatly modified. They've somehow learned that it is present on Earth, likely with their spy drones or portal spy teams, this is why they're here as well

original:
My dear describes my motives pretty clearly. We've survived a horrifying incident in That City full of shady bastards behind it essentially. We've travelled across the World, fought madmen along with their creations. My dear warned me though that eventually we can uncover things that will make government treat us differently. I convinced him though that our usefulness simply matters much more to them than our knowledge, as long as we have no objections to working for them. Then Cataclysm happened. Governments were gone. No united control. Only individual organizations remained. Some new, some remnants of former organizations. All have different motives.
 
    Even though there is a lot of work we have in terms of rebuilding everything, I've convinced my dear for us to become hunters of some sorts. We investigate activities of strange local cults, military formations. If we suspect them to have not particularly friendly motives, we carefully check their structures. Usually they clearly are hostile, attack everyone on sight, however some really are altruistic. Latter are much more discreet, not because it is their intention. They achieve their goals only by communicating with, helping people. They are forced into hiding, especially in New England area because of Strange Cults, 'THEM', 'True Superiors', 'Alliance'. Should not we help them to fend them off to keep everyone safe?
 
    They all diligently hunt for BL9, all of these bastards. Even altruistic organizations that we've contacted convince us of BL9 not being a bioweapon, huh? I mean, pretty much everything around, The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, can be considered bioweapons, pretty much not safe for majority of people. BL9, as our allies state, can be modified, to be used as protection against other hostile microorganisms, they even have proof of this. I don't know, my brother would not agree, but if there are no alternative options. This potentially can be used as means to protect all of us, our offspring, hopefully as well

original:
My father taught me one very important thing when I was a young girl. He told me that it is wrong to think in absolutes. Has he done something significant in his life with this way of thinking? Maybe. Maybe not. What I know is that his advice greatly helps me in my work. My work is not just means of acquiring money. It helps me to prevent people who think in absolutes from shaping the World in a way that they like. This is especially important if we are talking about genetical experiments related to unknown microorganisms which have many uses. From healthy drugs, protection, extending lives of people to bioweapons. Don't ask me how I got in this field of work. Let's just say that I have received plenty of military experience to work as a professional mercenary spy.
 
    I've heard of reputation of organization behind incidents in that mansion along with That City. No doubt that extremists were among it's leaders, intending to work on advanced bioweapons research. I was offered a job by an unknown man, who described himself as a former research scientist in that organization, who had changed his ways. My job was to intercept military, sent by that organization to kill their main scientist, stationed in That City's laboratory. My goal was not to save that scientist. Like I was told, scum simply wanted to sell property of their organization to highest bidder essentially. My task was to steal this property from military then bring it to my employer.
 
    As a careful person I am, I waited for a perfect opportunity to ambush them. However, my stealth approach was interrupted by hordes of mutants, attacking both me along with military. The whole city went to shit within a few minutes. I had to run for my life essentially. However, I am no dumb girl. I knew that lab must have contained various intelligence, notes, diaries, maybe even something more important. This scientist devoted himself to his work entirely. There must have been another sample in that laboratory. I managed to find both, though, it was very difficult to do based on what I've seen there honestly

original:
Name sounds like a cheap romance novel, but let's keep it like this for fun, as long as it makes both of us chuckle. How we've met? Ah, shit, reminds me of so much we've went through with her. Two desperate survivors in these horrible conditions stuck in a city full of terrors. Love was least of my priorities back then. I worked as a police officer in my home town. As I remember, this started with me receiving my promotion of a corporal under the condition that I would move to a nearby town. I needed money, so I agreed. It was That City, one of the most horrible pre-Cataclysm cases of unsanctioned bioweapons experiments.
 
    I was about to start my first day as a newly promoted corporal. I was being late when I've heard the sirens all across the city, evacuation helicopters recklessly getting away. On my way to police station I saw people aggressively chasing other people, leaping at them, grabbing them by their legs. They clawed them savagely then started to eat their flesh. It was horrifying and disgusting, I puked upon seeing this right in my car. Some of them saw me and ran towards my car, I pressed gas, running few of them over. I made my way to one of the closest relatively big markets.
 
    I went to this market get supplies, also to possibly find a good melee weapon, a fire axe or a wrench. I heard a running noise from the outside towards the same door I entered. A girl armed with a revolver clumsily yet quickly entered with a shambler behind her. I aimed at it, telling her to get down. With a headshot I killed it. Then we both ran towards my car, quickly made our way out of there. She was a junior robotics engineering student in That City. Her brother was a high-ranking veteran policeman. This explained to me her being pretty good with guns
translation:

As I remember, this started with me receiving my promotion of a corporal under the condition that I would move to a nearby town. I needed money, so I agreed. It was That City, one of the most horrible pre-Cataclysm cases of unsanctioned bioweapons experiments.
 
    I was about to start my first day as a newly promoted corporal. I was being late when I've heard the sirens all across the city, evacuation helicopters recklessly getting away. On my way to police station I saw people aggressively chasing other people, leaping at them, grabbing them by their legs. They clawed them savagely then started to eat their flesh. It was horrifying and disgusting, I puked upon seeing this right in my car. Some of them saw me and ran towards my car, I pressed gas, running few of them over. I made my way to one of the closest relatively big markets.
 
    I went to this market get supplies, also to possibly find a good melee weapon, a fire axe or a wrench. I heard a running noise from the outside towards the same door I entered. A girl armed with a revolver clumsily yet quickly entered with a shambler behind her. I aimed at it, telling her to get down. With a headshot I killed it. Then we both ran towards my car, quickly made our way out of there. She was a junior robotics engineering student in That City. Her brother was a high-ranking veteran policeman. This explained to me her being pretty good with guns
context:

original:
One of our top scientists, the one who taught me everything I knew back then about microorganisms research, became a liability, to my own advantage. Old fool didn't know that I was already working on my own organization. I sent a professional female spy to ambush our men and steal samples of that bioweapon. Fucking snake in red dress failed though. Luckily, she found more samples in that laboratory in addition to valuable intelligence from my former 'friend' that even that old fool didn't get his hands on. That City incident was a good reason for me to leave our organization under the pretext of being worried of further investigations. I had plenty of data to research until discovery in Europe.
 
    Villagers, Cultists, Military, all turned into obedient mutants. This was somewhere in Europe. Controlled by some ambitious fucker. His research was really of high quality though, but not as good as what I've made with a later discovery. Didn't gain much from this except for being more careful with choosing people to work for me. That fucking snake in red dress fooled me, sent me a fake sample instead of a real one, never trust devious fuckers. I had temporary success with my latest discovery back then. It was perfect for global evolution according to my own views. I was enhanced like never before. I came as a guest to my former benefactor. I showed him everything that I've become, something that he could never possibly achieve, then I killed him.
 
    Fuckers from that mansion ruined everything. My newest invention was entirely destroyed with me being forced into hiding. Until Cataclysm happened. The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, so much to research! However, none of them are even as near as sophisticated as alien symbiote, BL9, which is hunted even by alien pillagers from other galaxies. I have created 'True Superiors' organization, I have built 'THEIR' army, I have fooled 'Alliance', forcing them to work with my organization. These feeble altruistic fuckers think they can stop our evolution with a bunch of survivors?
translation:

That City incident was a good reason for me to leave our organization under the pretext of being worried of further investigations. I had plenty of data to research until discovery in Europe.
 
    Villagers, Cultists, Military, all turned into obedient mutants. This was somewhere in Europe. Controlled by some ambitious fucker. His research was really of high quality though, but not as good as what I've made with a later discovery. Didn't gain much from this except for being more careful with choosing people to work for me. It was perfect for global evolution according to my own views. I was enhanced like never before. I came as a guest to my former benefactor. I showed him everything that I've become, something that he could never possibly achieve, then I killed him.
 
    Fuckers from that mansion ruined everything. My newest invention was entirely destroyed with me being forced into hiding. Until Cataclysm happened. The Blob, Mycus, Triffids, so much to research! original: Shapeshifting, energized, formless grotesque creature that takes a shape of a blob-like amalgamation of all feral aliens, that were brought to Earth essentially by 'Alliance' for them to experiment on. Inhravtidius carapace on in the center of it along with a pincer in the place of it's left arm. Yengnutrium wings, protruding from it's back along with a razor sharp serrated claw in the place of it's right arm. Ulniviunite slime oozing from it along with multiple lamprey-type mouths from which long, whip-like spiked tongues are stretching. Ezrondium arachnid legs, incredibly sharp, piercing floor as it moves. Tentacles, emerging from various parts of it's body essentially. Unlike other beasts, this one is in particular rage, as if it was made for hunting. It is bigger, faster compared to other beasts, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's tentacles

original:
She is right, my honey really managed to rescue that scientist's daughter. Strange child, immune to That City's bioweapons, as she stated herself. That's what her father told her when injecting her with all kinds of shit. Her bruises were healing up at an extreme rate. The whole shit was really a conspiracy with shady people involved. This is what government told me later on. Hunter brute, horribly mutated scientist, stolen samples of bioweapons, shady female spy. That spy really did save my life multiple times, helping me to destroy this brute, but she clearly had her own motives there. Every time our paths crossed, I always knew that she had some errands to do, provided by her new employers. Whatever, we made it safe, now about events after That City essentially.
 
    Let's just say that government has become interested in two barely trained survivors going through so much shit successfully. We've been 'offered' government agents jobs. Not much choice, considering what we've seen. Then these were times of my duty in various parts of the World. Strangely, current New England prominent factions of madmen that are obsessed with BL9 symbiote really remind me of what I've seen in Europe. Is that some kind of a bullshit trend? As years went by, I tried to convince my engineer girl to let me talk government out of her further involvement. I've been seeing more and more shit that I didn't get killed for only because I'm too useful to kill essentially.
 
    Honey is too stubborn, she wanted to delve even deeper into this. Saving people from madmen with bioweapons is more important than building complex electromechanical systems. That's what she says. When Cataclysm happened, this tight grip was gone. So now we hunt for remnants of these madmen, whereas her brother with his partner try to rebuild everything in local areas. It's a fucking mess, but at least we've got each other to survive hopefully as well
translation:
She is right, my honey really managed to rescue that scientist's daughter. Strange child, immune to That City's bioweapons, as she stated herself. That's what her father told her when injecting her with all kinds of shit. Her bruises were healing up at an extreme rate. The whole shit was really a conspiracy with shady people involved. This is what government told me later on. Hunter brute, horribly mutated scientist, stolen samples of bioweapons, shady female spy. That spy really did save my life multiple times, helping me to destroy this brute, but she clearly had her own motives there. Every time our paths crossed, I always knew that she had some errands to do, provided by her new employers. Whatever, we made it safe, now about events after That City essentially.
 
    Let's just say that government has become interested in two barely trained survivors going through so much shit successfully. We've been 'offered' government agents jobs. Not much choice, considering what we've seen. Then these were times of my duty in various parts of the World. Strangely, current New England prominent factions of madmen that are obsessed with BL9 symbiote really remind me of what I've seen in Europe. Is that some kind of a bullshit trend? As years went by, I tried to convince my engineer girl to let me talk government out of her further involvement. I've been seeing more and more shit that I didn't get killed for only because I'm too useful to kill essentially.
 
    Honey is too stubborn, she wanted to delve even deeper into this. Saving people from madmen with bioweapons is more important than building complex electromechanical systems. That's what she says. When Cataclysm happened, this tight grip was gone. So now we hunt for remnants of these madmen, whereas her brother with his partner try to rebuild everything in local areas. It's a fucking mess, but at least we've got each other to survive hopefully as well

Ulniviunite are pangolin-like creatures, they breed and live in sandy cave areas located on shores of this planet. They have a body covered with slime, coated thick and durable scales, underbelly and tail grotesquely fleshy and slimy, lamprey-type mouth with a menacingly looking set of teeth, long anteater-like tongue along with incredibly thick and sturdy claws on the end of it's limbs.\n \n    Obviously, Wanzeltiums have brought them here. Possibly for using them as experimental subjects for infusing with BL9, since it is the main reason 'Alliance' is here. We must approach them carefully. If they are infused with BL9 then many of them must have mutated as well

original:
This really is a cheap romance novel name! Though, I actually find it funny. I was getting a robotics engineering degree in my university. I always found applied math, physics pretty fun. My brother, the cop in our family, approved of my decision, he is all fists and fighting, so analytical one in our family is a must. As my dear says about his first day of corporal rank experience, I felt the same way back then. Love, no. Safety, protection, yes. That's how I felt back then. My brother was missing, I was alone on the streets, searching for him, when the whole city went to shit. I ran as fast as I could to nearest building, coming across him. A guy in a police uniform, aiming his gun at me, telling me to get down. So I did, out of fear, yet he killed a shambler behind me.
 
    We made our way in his car to police station, which, disappointingly, was also infested with these mutants. Most were shamblers, but there was this horrible type. A fleshy beast with a grotesque head, long tongue, no eyes, and long claws size of a human. We were chased by a giant brute in this building. As we were hiding from it, I found documents proving that my brother left That City weeks ago to do his private investigation. Also we found a secret underground passage in That City's police station. It was leading to some kind of a laboratory complex, which answered most of our questions in terms of what the heck even happened in That City.
 
    This entire lab was a huge conspiracy. Unsanctioned bioweapons experiments. An incident with bioweapon leak was a result of lab's main mutated scientist going mad over his secret creation being stolen by some private military. On our way out of lab, we saved this scientist's daughter. Three of us barely made it out of there safely via an underground train system with that scientist beast and a huge brute chasing us
translation:
This really is a cheap romance novel name! Though, I actually find it funny. I was getting a robotics engineering degree in my university. I always found applied math, physics pretty fun. My brother, the cop in our family, approved of my decision, he is all fists and fighting, so analytical one in our family is a must. As my dear says about his first day of corporal rank experience, I felt the same way back then. Love, no. Safety, protection, yes. That's how I felt back then. My brother was missing, I was alone on the streets, searching for him, when the whole city went to shit. I ran as fast as I could to nearest building, coming across him. A guy in a police uniform, aiming his gun at me, telling me to get down. So I did, out of fear, yet he killed a shambler behind me.
 
    We made our way in his car to police station, which, disappointingly, was also infested with these mutants. Most were shamblers, but there was this horrible type. A fleshy beast with a grotesque head, long tongue, no eyes, and long claws size of a human. We were chased by a giant brute in this building. As we were hiding from it, I found documents proving that my brother left That City weeks ago to do his private investigation. Also we found a secret underground passage in That City's police station. It was leading to some kind of a laboratory complex, which answered most of our questions in terms of what the heck even happened in That City.
 
    This entire lab was a huge conspiracy. Unsanctioned bioweapons experiments. An incident with bioweapon leak was a result of lab's main mutated scientist going mad over his secret creation being stolen by some private military. On our way out of lab, we saved this scientist's daughter. Three of us barely made it out of there safely via an underground train system with that scientist beast and a huge brute chasing us

original: Usually we are not interested in projects of these savages. Majority of them are either dumb mutants, used for killing, or power hungry fools, obsessed with domination of local areas. They don't even care about improving living conditions for their own people. However, there are a few human scientists, who have told me about their most experienced scientist. It is the leader of 'True Superiors' organization at the same time essentially. Humans are feeble, mostly are worthless. But not this man. Even I, representative of a superior race, fear this man. It's like he is not even a man at this point. So what they said is that on their Militarized Island, with instructions made by this man, they developed a Super Soldier.\n \n    I came to Militarized Island to see quality of their work. It was pretty good, still, lacking many features that we could add. It was obviously a carefully made humanoid amalgamation of mutated animals that each of our 'Alliance' races brought here. Later when I wanted to talk with these scientists about our own, Davranides' projects, they told me that this man knows that I was one of the few Davranides scientists who showed interest in Super Soldier Project. Scientists said that this man insists that we enhance this project further. I said that I am not sure, but scientists simply replied. They said that Davranides will take on this work if 'Alliance' as a whole values their safety on Earth essentially. We don't want to make enemies out of our allies. We continued this project ourselves. Enhanced versions can be found in various impact sites Cave Systems, whereas experimental enhanced versions can be found in our own Mobile Bases

original: Welcome to BL9 Safety Base, survivor of hope in life, you don't mind if I call you like this? All systems are online, Energy Shield works exactly as my masters, as we have all, hoped for, thanks to your work! If inhabitants decide to go outside, shield will be deactivated for a split second then turned on again. If inhabitants decide to go back here, scanners, installed near entrance, will scan them, if they are former inhabitants, inhabitants will be able to go back here, shield will be deactivated for split second then turned back on again. My masters ordered me to advise you to make this your permanent, safe home here. Make a family, bring your love here, have children, adopt children, live as a civilization hopefully as well

What do you mean? You don't like quality of writing? Meh, most of what I do here is analyze bunch of romantic sexual fantasy novels honestly. Being a female android who likes to read a lot, this is pretty disgusting. Though uh who am I to judge? I'm just an android made for your use hopefully

I think that some of our agents like these types of novels, which is why I have stored in my storage system so many of them.
 
    This stuff, however, seems like it's genuinely based on real survivors who are not into weird fetishes! Except for this narcissist guy, who seems like he would have a sexual intercourse with his own thoughts about his superiority to other humans

original: Yengnutrium Mutant Amalgamation with all of it's typical traits: 2 asymetrically growing heads - one resembles a mix of a mantis' and fly's head with multiple rapidly blinking eyes - the other resembles a mix of a locust's and cockroach's head with 2 eyes at both sides of it. What's left of it's humanoid body is barely recognizable - it's vertically elongated with 2 winged tentacles protruding from it's back. 2 serrated curved claws in the place of the arms, and 2 spiked far apart insect legs. What distinguishes this creature from other Amalgamations is that it is bigger, faster, seems to be trained as an experimental soldier. It holds a strange organic-looking gun in one of it's claws

original: You have either managed to find or return to any of BL9 Safety Bases, it is good that you are here, safe! Proceed to Control Sector to talk to Base Android, responsible for safe work of all systems in this particular BL9 Safety Base. You can talk to Base Android to ask her various questions. She has a built-in system which makes her able to read various intel along with journals which we have collected. They are all optional to read, but are advised to read in general. They are all categorized, which only means that she will read them, based on your choices of questions categories along with your questions in general. You can go to Leisure Center to get a beverage or a drink from there. You might wonder why here there is nobody of our organization's representatives? Answer is simple. Safety. You probably understand that we are aware of all kinds of inhabitants roaming around. This includes benevolent survivors, hopefully, you are one of these survivors. At the same time these can be bandits, murderers, maniacs, double agents of Strange Cult, 'THEM', 'True Superiors' obviously. We prefer not to give any chance to either of these horrible bastards to try to weaken or damage our organization.\n \n    The most important journal for you to read is 'Instructions for Survivors' which is a must for survival of survivors who are interested in helping our organization achieve it's goal types which we concentrate on for survival of humanity in general. Key goal of our organization is to bring hope, safety, civilization that will guarantee survival, possibility of procreation to survivors hopefully as well
translation: You have either managed to find or return to any of BL9 Safety Bases, it is good that you are here, safe! Proceed to Control Sector to talk to Base Android, responsible for safe work of all systems in this particular BL9 Safety Base. You can talk to Base Android to ask her various questions. She has a built-in system which makes her able to read various intel along with journals which we have collected. They are all optional to read, but are advised to read in general. They are all categorized, which only means that she will read them, based on your choices of questions categories along with your questions in general. You can go to Leisure Center to get a beverage or a drink from there. You might wonder why here there is nobody of our organization's representatives? Answer is simple. Safety. You probably understand that we are aware of all kinds of inhabitants roaming around. This includes benevolent survivors, hopefully, you are one of these survivors. At the same time these can be bandits, murderers, maniacs, double agents of Strange Cult, 'THEM', 'True Superiors' obviously. We prefer not to give any chance to either of these horrible bastards to try to weaken or damage our organization.\n \n    The most important journal for you to read is 'Instructions for Survivors' which is a must for survival of survivors who are interested in helping our organization achieve it's goal types which we concentrate on for survival of humanity in general. Key goal of our organization is to bring hope, safety, civilization that will guarantee survival, possibility of procreation to survivors hopefully as well
